title: GIS Data Analyst Intern
location: Việt Nam
description:
AtGeoComply, our mission is toempower the future of digital trust. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today’s geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies likeDraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC,andAkamai, we are theglobal market leaderfor compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans for the next few years, including a targetedIPOand various M&A opportunities.

At the heart of it all is people – we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.
Job Summary

We seek an energetic, responsible intern to join our exciting project and growing organization. You will have opportunities to work with real projects and real data
What You Will Be Doing
• Research on GNSS data collected by different types of devices (iOS... Android, Garmin, etc) to evaluate the accuracy of geolocation data
• Perform ground location calculations from GNSS data package
About You
• Must have a solid knowledge of GNSS
• Demonstrates a keen understanding of spatial data and algorithms
• Demonstrates a vast knowledge of GIS applications (ArcGIS, QGIS)
Bonus Points if You
• Willingness to participate in field testing with the team
Let us share why we think you’d love working with us.
• We have a track record of success, a vision, and a plan for a promising future.GeoComply has close to 100% market share for player location regulatory compliance in the US gaming space. And we have fuelled that momentum with the expansion into new markets – media & entertainment and fintech.
• We are proud of our values and we live them in all of our actions, conversations, and work:There’s always a way; Together we can do more; Aim higher. Then higher; Act with integrity; For the greater good.
• We are proud to be part of a global team that develops award-winning solutionsfor some of the world’s largest and most innovative companies.
• We will support you on your learning journey.We invest in employee career growth and development. Our learning & development commitment includes leadership and technical development, a substantial budget for education and training, as well as dedicated work hours for self-study.
• We care about our team.Our GeoComply team is talented, has a bias for action, and is known for their positive attitude and energy.Team members are generously rewarded with competitive salaries, incentives, and a comprehensive benefits package.
• We care about giving back to the communities in which we live and work.GeoComply supports a broad range of community initiatives through donations and employee volunteer activities.
• We know that work can be fun.We take the time to create employee events and experiences where everyone can connect and celebrate.

At GeoComply, we live our value of building it right. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities

title: DATA SCIENTIST (FPT PLAY - HCM)
company_name: Công ty Cổ phần Viễn thông FPT Telecom
location: Việt Nam
description:
• Số lượng cần tuyển: 1
• Loại hình công việc: Toàn thời gian
• Đơn vị quản lý: Công ty TNHH Truyền hình FPT - FPT Television
• Mức lương: lương thỏa thuận
• Hạn nộp hồ sơ: 16-02-2023

CHI TIẾT CÔNG VIỆC
• Phối hợp với các đội dữ liệu FPT để thiết lập, đánh giá các dữ liệu, thu thập dữ liệu, xác định dữ liệu và yêu cầu dữ liệu phục vụ việc phân tích hành vi khách hàng, cho các bài toán dự đoán tình trạng hạ tầng, …
• Xây dựng mô hình, thuật toán để phân tích dữ liệu về khách hàng, hệ thống mạng. Tìm ra các thông tin quan trọng để tối ưu hệ thống.
• Phát triển thuật toán để dự đoán thông tin về khách hàng, hệ thống mạng ví dụ lưu lượng người dùng, tài nguyên sử dụng…
• Phát triển phần mềm liên quan tới phân tích dữ liệu, Machine Learning, tích hợp vào hệ thống hiện tại của công ty.
• Phân tích, trình bày kết quả phân tích dữ liệu, phối hợp với các phòng ban khác để tối ưu hệ thống mạng lỗi.
• Tổng hợp và phân tích các thông tin về hạ tầng hệ thống, để đưa ra các phương án, giải pháp... phát triển dự án.
• Tổng hợp các đề xuất và báo cáo Ban lãnh đạo kịp thời.Thực hiện công việc theo đúng chính sách, quy định, quy trình… và cam kết chất lượng (SLAs).
• Thực hiện các công việc khác có liên quan theo yêu cầu của Trưởng bộ phận hoặc Ban lãnh đạo bộ phận.

YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
• Tốt nghiệp Đại học Công nghệ thông tin/ Khoa học máy tính/Hệ thống thông tin quản lý.
• Đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh chuyên ngành.
• Hiểu biết về quy trình phân tích dữ liệu, bao gồm bóc tách vấn đề, mô hình dữ liệu.
• Có kinh nghiệm làm việc về Big data/ Machine Learning (>1 năm).
• Có kiến thức về thuật toán phân tích dữ liệu, Machine Learning.
• Có kỹ năng lập trình, làm việc với các ngôn ngữ lập trình, phần mềm cho Big Data, Machine Learning, ví dụ: C++, Java, Python.
• Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các platform lưu trữ, tính toán phân tán, ví dụ: Hadoop, Spark.
• Có khả tự nghiên cứu, ứng dụng công nghệ mới.
• Có kiến thức, kinh nghiệm sử dụng cơ sở dữ liệu SQL Language, MySQL
• Kỹ năng thể hiện thông tin dưới dạng hình ảnh, biểu đồ.
• Sử dụng R hoặc Python, các tool BI như Power BI, Tableau.
• Có kĩ năng quản lý và tổ chức công việc, giao tiếp tốt
• Nhiệt tình và trách nhiệm với công việc
• Có khả năng tự nghiên cứu học hỏi các công nghệ mới

QUYỀN LỢI
• Thỏa thuận lương theo năng lực.
• Gói thu nhập năm tương đương từ 14 - 17 tháng lương quy đổi (thưởng lương tháng 13, lương kinh doanh, tiền mừng tuổi,...)
• Đầy đủ các chế độ theo luật lao động hiện hành
• Chăm sóc sức khỏe định kì hàng năm, gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe chuyên biệt (FPT Care - khám chữa bệnh miễn phí tại tất cả các bệnh viện)
• Các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần CBNV và thân nhân,..
• Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, cởi mở
• Cơ sở vật chất và công cụ làm việc hiện đại, tiện nghi
• Nhiều cơ hội phát triển và thăng tiến
• Văn hóa Doanh nghiệp đặc sắc, sinh động bậc nhất với các hoạt động hấp dẫn: tân binh, 72 giờ trải nghiệm, teambuilding, sinh nhật FPT, ngày 11/11,...
• Hưởng các gói ưu đãi cước khi sử dụng dịch vụ FPT Telecom
• Thời gian làm việc: 8h - 12h và 13h30 - 17h30 từ thứ 2 - thứ 6

title: Product Operations Manager - Data Analytics
location: Việt Nam
description:
About Us

Inspectorio is a SaaS company founded in 2016, aimed at helping brands, retailers and manufacturers build an interconnected supply chain. Through our suite of products, including RISE, SIGHT, and TRACKING, we’re able to support our customers to manage risk through digitalized quality, compliance, and production tracking programs.

Bound by our mission to build an interconnected, sustainable, and transparent supply chain, we’ve grown to over 300 Inspectorians globally in 6 years and was named Best Tech StartUp in 2021 by The Tech Tribune. And the industry sees our vision, as today, Inspectorio is used by over 8,000 customers, including some of the largest brands and retailers in the world.

Our Product Team plays a crucial role in continuously delivering new and improved features and functionality to our world-class products. In our pursuit to continuously raise the bar, we are now offering a great opportunity for a Product Operations Manager to join our world class Product... Team.

Summary

We are looking for a PRODUCT OPERATIONS MANAGER to improve product team efficiency through leading operational projects within Inspectorio’s fast-scaling product environment.

The ideal candidate has a deep knowledge of product management best practices and has worked as a Product Manager, Data Analyst, Operations Manager or similar. They are obsessed with efficiency and are able to effectively identify, define and execute processes and systems for solving inefficiencies. They also have proven experience leading change management initiatives within a fast-scaling environment.

What you'll do
• Work closely with Product leaders and key stakeholders to document product metrics into technical requirements and provide data interpretation through reports.
• Use expertise in SQL and BI tools to map data framework and build dashboards that the product team can action on.
• Define operations needed for data instrumentation gaps and collaborate with engineer team to ensure accurate reporting across stakeholder teams.
• Monitor and provide updates on product analysis using growth models and strategy optimization.
• Own and execute additional ad-hoc projects in alignment with Product Strategy roadmap and vision.

We know this is the part of the JD you really care about it. So, let’s get to it. Role requirements are:
• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Product Management, Operations Management or similar.
• Proven experience in Product Management, Data Analyst, Program Management, Operations Management or similar.
• Obsession with data analytics through defining and implementing data frameworks with driving efficiency through the implementation of effective systems and processes.
• Analytical and process-oriented, data-driven; able to identify operational data, gaps, inefficiencies and define executable solutions to address them.
• Proven experience in leading change management initiatives within a scaling environment.
• Exceptional communication and collaboration skills.

Why it would be awesome to work with us
• 🍹 Unlimited annual leave: Yes, you heard that right! We take work:life balance seriously!
• 🏝️ Flexible working: You can WFA, or from our many hubs around the world.
• 💪 Project ownership: Whatever work or social project you’re passionate about, we’ll listen!
• 🥳 Fun: Company-sponsored trips, weekly parties, sporting events, and more.
• 🌱 Personal and professional growth: we make sure to invest heavily in our team!
• 🌎 Global team: you’ll be joining a fun, and welcoming global team from over 40 countries.

Our Values

Carlos Moncayo, our CEO wrote these values himself - he’s deeply passionate about these and they’re at the center of everything we do. They’re in our day-to-day and our driving force for success.
• EXCELLENCE: We pursue mastery and craftsmanship. “Good enough” is our enemy. We have a thirst and desire for knowledge. There’s always an opportunity to be better.
• AUTONOMY: We act independently when recognizing opportunities for improvement. We seek guidance, and clear goals instead of orders. We self-assess the quality and impact of our work.
• COURAGE: We share our opinion, even if it’s uncomfortable. We are candid with colleagues. We are willing to experiment and try something new, even if we’re not sure it will succeed.
• HUMBLENESS: We crave opportunities to learn from the people around us. We leave our egos outside the office. We focus on listening to other perspectives

title: Senior SAP Consultant (CO Automation & Data Analytics)
location: Việt Nam
description:
Company Description

Bosch first started its operations in Vietnam in 1994 and registered a wholly-owned subsidiary in 2008. According to the business strategy of Bosch in Vietnam, from 1st July 2014 on all business entities were merged into Bosch Vietnam Co. Ltd. with its head office at Ho Chi Minh City plant (HcP) in Dong Nai Province.

HcP has started its belt assembly in a rented building on 1st August 2008 as the assembly plant of Tilburg Plant (TbP). On 14th April 2011, HcP celebrated the inauguration of the new plant (Lth101 with 17,000 sqm), which did not only allow to increase the production depth, but also to facilitate the push belt assembly of this high-tech product. On 3rd July 2012 HcP marked a big milestone by starting to produce the second component (loop-set) for its push belt. Since November 2012, HcP doubled the production floor space and increase the net total floor space up to 56.000 m², and have successfully increased its production capacity and realized a lot of... new line SOP’s.

For further information, please visit our website: www.bosch.com.vn

Job Description

1. Conducts data analysis to make business recommendations
• Collaborates with several groups of stakeholders to understand their business needs, formulates complete end-to-end analysis
• Provide data insight to support customers' decision making
• Develop data model and visualize by tools such as PowerBI the data following business requirements

2. Develop and Maintain Automation solutions
• Collaborates with the team to automate Controlling processes including several applications (SAP, Excel…) by the use of corresponding Automation tools such as Automation Anywhere, GuiXT etc.
• Develop and implement appropriate process control systems
• Assist in development, testing and support of automation solutions to meet the defined requirements.

3. Knowledge Management
• Training: Perform quality knowledge transfer towards end users, key users, proxy or at assignment to enable services, secure operation, sustain/ improve service quality
• Learning: continuously develop knowledge on responsible areas or where organization has demand to perform effective services

Qualifications

1. Education
• Bachelor degree in Economics or Information Technology
• PowerBI Certificate is a plus
• Greenbelt in Automation Anywhere is a plus
• SAP CO Certificate is a plus

2. Work experience
• 3 - 5 years experience exploring data as a data analyst
• Well understand SAP CO process. Knowledge in CO’s tables relationship in ECC and S4HANA is a plus Well understand SAP CO process.
• Good experience with collecting data and building data model
• Knowledge of programming languages such as DAX, M Query, SQL, Python
• Proficiently using PowerBI
• Experience on other visualization tools such as SAC, Tableau,… is nice to have
• Well understand solution design document and accordingly create process automation solution
• Well understand technical roadmaps, industry best practices for implementing RPA and weave them into business solutions required by various program offices

3. Traits and Skills
• Analytical thinking, ability to think with a strategic and innovative mindset
• Effective English communication for global collaboration
• Problem solving
• Customer - Result - Quality Oriented
• Discipline. Integrity. Responsible. Disagree but commit.
• Project / Task Management
• A team player. Easy to work with. Participate team's and company's teambuilding activities
• Ready for travel when needed (for training/ project/ cross-site support)

Additional Information
• Shuttle buses are provided from various locations of HCMC and Bien Hoa City
• 16+ days of annual leaves
• Attractive salary package, allowances and bonuses
• Premium healthcare insurance for employees and 2 direct relatives
• On-the-job training and coaching

Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

title: Data Scientist
location: Việt Nam
via: qua Find English Speaking Jobs In Vietnam | EnglishWorkVietNam
description:
Who are we looking for?

We are looking for a Data Scientist who will support our projects with
insights gained from analyzing client data. The ideal candidate is adept at
using large data sets to resolve problems for clients and process optimization
and using models to test the effectiveness of different courses of action.
They must have strong experience using a variety of data mining/data analysis
methods, using a variety of data tools, building and implementing models,
using/creating algorithms, and creating/running simulations. They must have a
proven ability to drive business results with their data-based insights. They
must be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional
teams. The right candidate will have a passion for discovering solutions
hidden in large data sets and working with stakeholders to improve business
outcomes.

What are your responsibilities?
01.

Data mining or extracting usable data from valuable data source

02.

Using machine... learning tools to select features, create and optimize
classifiers

03.

Carrying out preprocessing of structured and unstructured data

04.

Enhancing data collection procedures to include all relevant information for
developing analytic systems

05.

Processing, cleansing, and validating the integrity of data to be used for
analysis

06.

Analyzing large amounts of information to find patterns and solutions

07.

Developing prediction systems and machine learning algorithms

08.

Presenting results in a clear manner

09.

Propose solutions and strategies to tackle business challenges

10.

Cross collaborates throughout the organization

Do you meet these job requirements?
Education:
• Bachelor's degree with a major in IT university
Experience:
• At least three (03) years of Data Science.
• Knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and
database query languages like SQL, Hive, and Pig is desirable. Familiarity
with Scala, Java, or C++is an added advantage.
• Statistics – Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of
statistical tests, distributions, regression, maximum likelihood
estimators, etc. Proficiency in statistics is essential for data-driven
companies.
• Machine Learning– good knowledge of machine learning methods like
k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, and Decision Forests.
• Strong Math Skills (Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra) –
understanding the fundamentals of Multivariable Calculus and Linear
Algebra is important as they form the basis of a lot of predictive
performance or algorithm optimization techniques.
• Data Wrangling – proficiency in handling imperfections in data is an
important aspect of a data scientist job description.
• Experience with Data Visualization Tools like matplotlib, ggplot, d3.js.,
Tableau that help to visually encode data
• Excellent Communication Skills – it is incredibly important to describe
findings to a technical and non-technical audience.
• Strong Software Engineering Background
• Hands-on experience with data science tools
• Problem-solving aptitude
• Analytical mind and great business sense
• Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a relevant field is preferred
• Proven Experience as Data Analyst or Data Scientist
Specific skills:
• Be able to work independently and as a part of one team as well as with
mixed audiences/ stakeholders.
• Fluently written and spoken English
Are you excited to explore our perks?
• Competitive take-home cash together with monthly allowances
• Performance appraisal and salary review twice a year
• Opportunities to work in multi cities (Da Nang/ Binh Duong/Ho Chi Minh)
and explore the US culture in Hawaii
• Unlimited learning budget and tons of training sessions (English,
wellness & tech-share workshops)
• More than 16 days off per year
• Fun vibe at work: daily tea break, sports activities, celebrations, outing
days, and annual company trip
• Healthcare policy: social insurance, annual health check and health
coverage budget

title: Business Data Analyst Team Lead
location: Việt Nam (+1 vị trí khác)
description:
A little bit about GeoComply

At GeoComply, our mission is to empower the future of digital trust. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today's geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies like DraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC, and Akamai, we are the global market leader for compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans for the next few years, including a targeted US IPO and various M&A opportunities.

At the heart of it all is people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.

Job Summary

The Business Data Analysis team contributes to GeoComply’s success by developing reports for customers, providing them with intel regarding their users based on information and data gathered through the back office... of our systems. This Business Data Analysis Team Lead position reports to Business Intelligence Manager on a day-to-day basis.

In this role, you are expected to take accountability for business data and products in the Business Data Analysis team that continuously contribute to the business goals of the company.

What You Will Be Doing
• Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions.
• Lead and further develop vision, mission, and strategies with KPIs for all products/data in Business Data Analysis team
• Lead, inspire, and further develop a team of Business Data Analysts in BI team.
• Utilize existing scripts/tools to acquire data from different sources and produce ad-hoc reports
• Manually review test reports
• Collaborate with internal teams to understand reporting requirements and derive key metrics
• Ensure that reports are up to standard in terms of both data quality and presentation
• Stay informed of database changes to ensure that reports are produced as expected
• Contribute ideas towards team development
• Apply team process in all tasks
• Develop dashboards to enable easy tracking and communication of data and reports.
• Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the company’s technologies, products, processes, data, and teams

About You
• 5+ years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models, with a Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another quantitative field from any of the top-tier colleges.
• Data-oriented personality. Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development.
• Great communication skills with customer-mindset. Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.
• Good leadership and team management skills.
• Critical thinking and problem solving skills and demonstrated progress management and planning skills
• Good applied statistics skills such as distributions, statistical testing, regression.
• Good scripting and programming skills. Experience using statistical computer languages, Python, PySpark, SQL to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets.
• Experience with common data science toolkits such as NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, etc.
• Experience with data visualisation tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, Superset, Kibana.
• Proficiency in using query languages SQL.
• Experience with NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase is a plus.
• Experience with distributed data/computing tools like Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark is a big plus.

Let us share why we think you’d love working with us.

We have a track record of success and a vision and a plan for a promising future. GeoComply has close to 100% market share for player location regulatory compliance in the US gaming space. And we have fuelled that momentum with the expansion into new markets - media & entertainment and fintech.

We are proud of our values and we live them in all of our actions, conversations, and work: There’s always a way; Together we can do more; Aim higher. Then higher; Act with integrity; For the greater good.

We are proud to be part of a global team that develops award-winning solutions for some of the world’s largest and most innovative companies.

We will support you on your learning journey. We invest in employee career growth and development. Our learning & development commitment includes leadership and technical development, a substantial budget for education and training, as well as dedicated work hours for self-study.

We care about our team. Our GeoComply team is talented, has a bias for action, and is known for its positive attitude and energy. Team members are generously rewarded with competitive salaries, incentives, and a comprehensive benefits package.

We care about giving back to the communities in which we live and work. GeoComply supports a broad range of community initiatives through donations and employee volunteer activities.

We know that work can be fun. We take the time to create employee events and experiences where everyone can connect and celebrate.

Now What? Send us your resume and a cover letter. We Can’t Wait To Meet You.

At GeoComply, we live our value of Act with Integrity. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities.

We care about your privacy and want you to be informed about your rights. Please read our Applicant Privacy Notice before applying for the position

GeoComply focuses on Software Compliance, Geospatial, Cyber Security, and Fin Tech. Their company has offices in Vancouver, Las Vegas, and Montreal. They have a large team that's between 201-500 employees.

You can view their website at https://www.geocomply.com

Harness the data generated from sales and transactions to 1.4 million existing customers, 1.8 million policies and from activity of hundred thousands of sales agents, develop insights that can be translated into actions that drive business growth at different areas (Agency/Partnership Distribution, Product Development, Operations, Customer service, Fraud detection) Opportunity to be part of one of the most prestigious insurance businesses globally, to turn big data... into actions and to interact with every function to develop an in-depth knowledge of the business. This role is perfect for someone who has solid analytics experience and is always curious and passionate to uncover insights to get our business off the ground Job Description Job Responsibilities Support Team Leader and Analytics Business Partner Lead in collaborating with business stakeholders to understand business challenges and propose data analytics/ data science solutions Mine and analyze large-scale data sources (both structured and unstructured) to uncover insights, issues and opportunities and recommend solutions Build, validate, test and deploy machine learning models Participate in the improvement of database management, data logics/ rules/ dictionary documentation, reporting and extraction workflow process through streamlining and automation. Coordinate with 3rd party analytics or regional Centre of Excellence experts to learn and replicate best practice in Vietnam Provide technical sharing/training to team members Other projects/ tasks assigned by direct managers Job Accountability Successfully deliver data analytics projects using advanced techniques/ modelling (e.g: Cross-sell Improvement, Customer Churn Management, etc.) under the supervision of Team leader and Analytics Business Partner Lead Play a part in discovering/ leveraging new/ under-leveraged/ external sources of data, centralizing database, aligning data processing rules, simplifying process/reporting system Job Requirements Qualifications Degree in Mathematics/ Statistics/ Computer Science or related Quantitative discipline, preferably a Master Experience Min 2-3 years of hands-on experience in statistical modelling/ machine learning Knowledge and skill Knowledge of statistical and predictive modeling concepts, machine learning approaches, clustering and classification techniques/ recommendation and optimization algorithms is required Ability to interpret data and translate them into actionable insights, communicate them to mass audience Being proficient in SQL, R and/or Python SAS knowledge is a plus Critical thinking Curiosity mindset & Can-do attitude Self-motivated, independent learner, and willing to share knowledge with team members Decent communication skill Prudential is an equal opportunity employer. We provide equality of opportunity of benefits for all who apply and who perform work for our organisation irrespective of sex, race, age, ethnic origin, educational, social and cultural background, marital status, pregnancy and maternity, religion or belief, disability or part-time / fixed-term work, or any other status protected by applicable law. We encourage the same standards from our recruitment and third-party suppliers taking into account the context of grade, job and location. We also allow for reasonable adjustments to support people with special requirements

title: Data Engineer
location: Việt Nam
description:
What you’re going to do
• Design, construct, install, test, and maintain data management systems
• Build data transformations, data model, dashboard and reports.
• Ensure that all systems meet the business/company requirements as well as industry practices
• Integrate up-and-coming data management and software engineering technologies into existing data structures
• Develop set processes for data mining, data modeling, and data production
• Create custom software components and analytics applications
• Research new uses for existing data
• Employ an array of technological languages and tools to connect systems together
• Install/update disaster recovery procedures
• Recommend different ways to constantly improve data reliability and quality

What we’re looking for
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science or similar
• Min. 3 years’ proven experience as a Data Engineer or similar
• Proficient in Data Modelling, Data Architecture , ETL, Data warehousing, Data Lake
• Proficient in... Linux/Unix and shell scripting as well as in functional programming languages
• Proficient in one or more scripting language (e.g Python, R)
• Experience in Apache Hadoop based analytics coving data processing, access, storage, governance, security, and operations
• Experience in Cloud based Big Data technologies
• Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift
• Prior data streaming experience with Spark/Python,...
• Knowledge in deploying microservices
• Creative thinking backed by strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Sharp minds, good vibes

We are the sharp-minded IT experts who tackle the trickiest software and security challenges. With more than 630 employees in our locations in Zurich (HQ), Bern, Lausanne, Budapest, Lisbon, Singapore, and Ho Chi Minh City, we make the digital business of our clients work.

As a great team, we empower each other to share, grow and succeed. The unique Adnovum spirit across locations stands for helping each other at any time, having an open door and contributing to an appreciating and trustful atmosphere. We always enjoy having a laugh, a coffee or a drink together!

Apart from our unique «one Adnovum» spirit, we offer a solution-oriented engineering culture with flat hierarchies, which gives you the opportunity to contribute with your opinions and ideas. We embrace flexible working, like the possibility to work part-time and a hybrid work model. Your continuous education and development are key to us. Therefore, we actively encourage and support individual training opportunities.

We offer
• different customer projects using technologies like Java 8, Java EE, EJB, JPA, Hibernate, Spring, JUnit, Mockito, Eclipse RCP, WebServices (RESTful, SOAP), JavaScript, Cordova, JSF, Angular (2), HTML5, CSS 3, JQuery, etc.
• project assignments according to your skill set and development goals.
• working side by side with highly skilled and experienced software engineers.
• collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland, Hungary, Portugal and Singapore.
• friendly working atmosphere in a well-equipped and professional IT environment.
• long-term and stable job with flexible working hours.
• a competitive salary plus a performance based bonus, a premium healthcare plan and free English classes.

For data privacy reasons, we only accept applications submitted via our online portal. Applications received by e-mail cannot be processed. Thank you for your understanding.

Adnovum accepts only direct applications. Any applications submitted by recruitment agencies without contractual agreement will be treated as direct applications

title: Business Intelligence Data Analyst
location: Việt Nam (+1 vị trí khác)
description:
Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

This role will participate in the regular catchup with stakeholders to understand the changes on the business side and their data needs... Proactively monitor the trends in the existing reports and develop new business insights. Work together with data engineers and other analysts to explore new opportunities for analytics and take actions to drive analytical projects to support other departments’ decision-making with data.

Responsibilities:
• Business Intelligence:
• Provide stakeholders with database related understandings
• Design, update and optimize dashboards, tables, and others to give accurate insights and/or support operations
• Maintain and improve data integrity
• Plan and implement analytics projects

- And:
• 1. Analytics (50%)
• Insights: modeling & produce actionable data

- Descriptive stats: Measure operational efficiency & cost metrics and track SLAs adherence
• 2. Process & Systems (30%): Improve workflow
• Suggest and recommend changes in existing system and operating processes to improve productivity and stability of the service infrastructure
• Reduce manual work

- Prepare for scaling
• 3. Informational (20%)
• Source of information for other teams. Answering questions like “Is there a fast way to get data about xx?”
• Query maintenance
• IT support

Requirements:
• Experience: 1-2 years working as a data analytics professional.
• Technical skills: SQL, Data Visualization such as Tableau, Python is a plus
• Familiarity with cloud data tools is a plus
• Education / Qualifications: Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Systems

Working address: Ninja Van Vietnam Office, Tan Binh district, Ho Chi Minh city.

Salary and benefits:
• Competitive income compared to the market
• "Tet" bonus , Performance review from 1 - 4 months
• Paid social insurance based on full salary
• 12 days annual leave, 5 days sick leave (with full salary)
• High-class AON Health Insurance for manager level.
• Year End Party, annual Townhall Ceremony
• Annual company trip
• Attractive team-building activities, regular internal activities
• Provide laptop for employees

Training and developing:
• Participate in internal training courses: online/offline
• Opportunities to promote to higher positions: Senior, Team Leader, Manager etc.

Work environment & colleagues:
• Senior leaders are open-minded, respectful and ready to facilitate personal growth
• Young and dynamic working environment
• Scope of work is large, the company has more than 5000 employees, the company has operations spreading to 63 provinces/cities thoughout the country.

Submit a job application

By applying to the job, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our Privacy Policy Notice (the “Notice”) and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data by Ninja Logistics Pte Ltd (the “Company”) for the purposes set out in the Notice. In the event that your job application or personal data was received from any third party pursuant to the purposes set out in the Notice, you warrant that such third party has been duly authorised by you to disclose your personal data to us for the purposes set out in the the Notice.

Ninja Van focuses on Enterprise Software, E-Commerce, Transportation, Logistics, and Content Delivery. Their company has offices in Singapore and Special Capital Region of Jakarta. They have a large team that's between 501-1000 employees. To date, Ninja Van has raised $32.5M of funding; their latest round was closed on April 2016.

You can view their website at https://www.ninjavan.co/ or find them on Twitter, Facebook, and LinkedIn

location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Mô tả công việc

1. Báo cáo (20%)

• Hiệu chỉnh về data model, công thức, visual các báo cáo hiện có trên Dashboard

2. Phân tích (40%)
• Tổng hợp các nhu cầu từ end-user hoặc tự nhận diện nhu cầu dựa trên dữ liệu, từ đó thực hiện các phân tích dữ liệu để đưa ra insight

3. Tư vấn + Hỗ trợ (40%)

• Hỗ trợ các phòng ban xuất các dữ liệu liên quan đến các báo cáo trên Dashboard Power BI

Yêu cầu ứng viên

• Tư duy logic, top-down tốt.
• Tư duy phản biện.
• Chủ động, làm việc hướng mục tiêu, không hướng chức năng.
• Khả năng làm việc độc lập & làm việc nhóm
• Khả năng tự học hỏi, tra cứu và đọc tốt tài liệu tiếng Anh để tự mở rộng kiến thức chuyên môn.

title: Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
We are seeking data analyst talent to join our team

What do you get from this job?
• The opportunity to work with talents in Product Team (Vietnam and Indonesia)
• Competitive compensation
• A talented and very motivated team
• An exciting opportunity to learn and grow, a real challenge – we uphold to high quality standards where team effort is pivotal and solution is rarely obvious, you can and is expected to shape the way forwards

Job Desciption
• Visualize data and insights for both business and technical audiences.
• Develop descriptive analytics to assist business users in making timely and accurate decisions.
• Using business intelligence tool to process and analyze data
• Other ad hoc duties as assigned by Line Manager

YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
• Highly Proficient in SQL (experience in BigQuery is a big plus)
• Experience in using any of the following is a plus but not a pre-requisite (Google DataStudio, Tableau, Metabase, Domo, PeriscopeData, PowerBI or any other similar... products)
• Capable of building hypotheses and demonstrate the ability to identify and communicate data driven insights.
• Detail-oriented and excellent time manager who thrives in a fast-paced working environment.

title: DATA ANALYST INTERN
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
POSITION TITLE: DATA ANALYST INTERN

FUNCTIONAL BUSINESS OBJECTIVES (FBOs):

Genkin is looking to hire Data Analyst Intern to join our data team. You will support the Operation Manager and Product Development team to master the data set, developing reports, and troubleshooting data issues. To do well in this role you need a very fine eye for detail, experience as a data analyst, and a deep understanding of the popular data analysis tools and databases.

Report to: Operation Manager

______________________________________________________________________

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Learn business practices and business etiquette as it relates to Logistics support
• Ensure that all information is successfully imported into the system by monitoring and controlling all data upload applications as well as the data quality of our data providers
• Analyze data to drive operational efficiencies
• Translate complex analytics into clear concise actionable communication and influence logistics team... through the presentation of data base recommendations
• Support logistics team on reporting and reinforcing of Key Performance Indicators
• Assist with documentation updates
• Create documentations on Logistics KPI logics and calculations
• Other admin tasks assigned by manager or supervisor

QUALIFICATIONS:
• Have a relevant degree such as Master's and Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, Science, Data Analytics, Business, Information Systems, Graduate, Economics
• Possess an in-depth understanding of analytical tools and ways of presenting data
• Sufficient knowledge of Microsoft Office: (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook). Using Microsoft Excel at the advanced level like writing Macros and using VBA lookups
• Strong written and verbal communication skills
• Strong analytical skills
• Knowing R or Python–Statistical Programming is a plus
• Proficient in data visualization tools (Tableau, PowerBI, etc.) is a plus
• Fluent in English; verbal and written

BENEFITS:
• Salary 3.000.000VND/month (negotiable)
• Full-time positions after internship
• Company's trip to Japan
• Laptop and mobile phone provided
• Various activities: snack time, workout, acoustic show, etc...
• Fast paced, creative and fun working environment in the heart of district 1, Ho

Chi Minh City

How to apply:

Send your English CV to email

title: Data Analyst (1 year contract)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Job Description Summary

Job Description

Who We Are
BD is a leading global medical technology company that creates medical technology, devices and laboratory equipment for a variety of needs across the healthcare sector. At BD, we are looking for candidates who possess passion, innovative solutions and a commitment to our one mission of improving access to groundbreaking medical and biotechnology services for people near and far, delivering state-of-the-art technology and cutting-edge research in the battle to fight and cure infectious diseases. With a global reach that extends across 50 countries worldwide, our network of professionals collaborates on effective measures to deliver enhanced patient quality such as lower health care delivery costs, improved health care and safety, and expanded health care for all. Join our company and see how you can become a part of one global mission to make a difference in human health.

Job Summary
• To support Business in data collection... collation, load into system and analysis.
• Provide or generate the report of the data reconciliation from IMS data, Trade sales data, Activity data (SFDC) and financial data for management report (3 Way Reckon Data) to establish customer insights & strategy planning for businesses.
• Manage end user price and alert to businesses if any.
• A connection between all supporting process functions together to meet the Transformation implement requirement.
• Able offer training of salesforce.com to associates and sales representative. Validate territory sales performance in quarterly basic and yearly to support ComOps in SIP calculation.

Key Responsibilities
• Work closely with Business and Distributors to collect, collate, load into system and analyze In-Market sales data.
• Ensure Master Data is proactively cleaned up and accurate before each loading into the system.
• Administration of the DCT (Distributor Consolidation Tool) tool, Salesforce.com, always ensuring the integrity of the data.
• To implement system changes and modifications, including reporting on lead, account and opportunity activity and production of sales performance reports.
• Work closely with Business and Distributors to collect, collate and analyze SIOP file ie In-Market Sales, In-Market Projection, Inventory, Purchase Orders and Purchase Plans.
• Establish strong working relationship across the organization to effectively support Business goals and needs.
• Provide or generate the report of the data reconciliation from IMS data, Trade sales data, Activity data (SFDC) and financial data for management report (3 Way Reckon Data).
• Validate territory sales performance in quarterly basic and yearly to support COM in SIP calculation.
• Perform any other tasks/ ad hoc projects as assigned.

SFDC (Salesforce.com):
• Set Up the data parameter on SFDC for new implementation or new AM/KAM.
• Regular update of new SFDC data such as new customer, new account, etc.
• Trouble shooting for any SFDC technical issue for the AM/KAM.
• Conduct the SFDC training for new onboard AM/KAM.
• Generate the report of SFDC and give some analyst for the monthly activity results to the businesses.

IMS Data and Inventory Data:
• Manage and maintain IMS, inventory data from distributor in weekly/monthly basis.
• Distribute the IMS report to the KAM, SAL/NAL in weekly/monthly basis.
• Validate the IMS data uploaded to Qlikview in monthly basis.
• Identify the new account from IMS data and upload it into SFDC (since the account of SFDC is the primary reference for Qlikview).
• Generate the IMS data report (Either from IMS data or Qlikview) for Business needs.
• Generate the near expired items from inventory report.
• Generate any custom reports based on business, CGM or other department requirements.
• Manage the competitor data based on business (Need to be well defined since this data is coming from external data/party).

Our Requirements
• Degree holder in the field of Business Administration preferably in Supply Chain field or equivalent in data statistical analysis.
• Minimum 2-3 years relevant experience.
• Experience of CRM system (SFDC, Microsoft Dynamic CRM, Oracle Sales Cloud, etc.) are preferable.
• Experience on Pharma or Device industry are preferable.
• Scala/SAP & Microsoft office (Excel, Word, Power point, Power BI, etc.) application knowledge.
• High proficiency in spreadsheets (i.e., pivot tables).

Culture and Benefits

Here at BD, we embrace a growth mindset, building capabilities for the future and helping you become the best version of yourself. We offer our employees a clear direction and career pathway for development. We pride ourselves on our transparent and rigorous talent processes that are inclusive, deeply embedded in trust, aligned with our culture, and enable us to achieve strategic imperatives of the organization. Our leaders are committed, engaged and accountable to making talent our top priority.

How To Apply

Submit your application by clicking on the “apply” button at the top of the page.

Primary Work Location
VNM Ho Chi Minh City - Me Linh Point Tower

Additional Locations

Work Shift

description:
Nhằm đẩy mạnh quá trình Chuyển đổi số trong hoạt động kinh doanh và quản trị điều hành, hướng đến tầm nhìn trở thành Ngân hàng bán lẻ hiện đại, đa năng hàng đầu Việt Nam, Sacombank đang tìm kiếm nguồn nhân lực chất lượng cao thuộc Khối Công nghệ thông tin và Trung tâm Chuyển đổi số với quy mô lớn và mức độ phù hợp trong nhiều lĩnh vực: Phát triển ứng dụng, Vận hành ứng dụng, An toàn thông tin, Kỹ thuật hạ tầng,...

Đến với Sacombank, Bạn sẽ nhận được các CƠ HỘI và ĐẶC QUYỀN sau:
• Được Đào tạo & làm việc cùng chuyên gia nước ngoài; mở rộng phạm vi công việc qua các Dự án số hóa; trực tiếp tác nghiệp, tham mưu cùng Ban Lãnh đạo Ngân hàng.
• Lộ trình thăng tiến/phát triển nghề nghiệp rõ ràng, quy hoạch trở thành Cán bộ quản lý từ sau 2 năm.
• Cơ chế phúc lợi hấp dẫn, bao gồm: Thu nhập theo năng lực, thưởng vào các dịp Lễ/ Tết, thưởng tháng 13, thưởng thành tích cá nhân/ tập thể, thưởng kết quả hoạt động kinh doanh toàn hàng, chế độ nghỉ mát, Bảo hiểm, khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm, các... khoản vay ưu đãi dành cho CBNV, …vv

Địa điểm làm việc: 266 - 268 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Phường Võ Thị Sáu, Quận 3, TP. HCM.

Hãy Ứng tuyển ngay Công việc bên dưới:

I. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC

- Xây dựng giải pháp và lập trình các tầng xử lý trên hệ thống MIS bao gồm: Data Warehouse, Data Model, BI 

- Tích hợp tất cả các nguồn dữ liệu từ các hệ thống ứng dụng vào Data Warehouse 

- Hỗ trợ các Đơn vị nghiệp vụ ngân hàng khi có nhu cầu khai thác dữ liệu từ hệ thống Mis/DW.

- Thực hiện phân tích các mô hình dữ liệu, dự đoán, dự báo, báo cáo phân tích,.. 

- Báo cáo định kỳ theo quy định hoặc theo yêu cầu của cấp quản lý trực tiếp.

II. YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC:

1. Bằng cấp/Chứng chỉ:

- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên các chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc các ngành có liên quan.

- Tiếng anh: Có khả năng giao tiếp; đọc hiểu tài liệu kỹ thuật. 

2. Kiến thức/Kinh nghiệm chuyên môn:

Có ít nhất một trong các nhóm kỹ năng sau: 

- Nắm vững kiến thức về Database (Oracle,SQL,Server), thành thạo PL/SQL và các công cụ tích hợp dữ liệu ELT.

- Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 1 năm làm việc với các công cụ BI (OBIEE / OAS ) 

- Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 1 năm phân tích dữ liệu, sử dụng các ngôn ngữ R, Python,.. sử dụng công cụ SAS,.. 

Ứng viên có các kinh nghiệm sau là một lợi thế 

- Có các chứng chỉ công nghệ liên quan đến hệ thống MIS/DW như: Oracle,BI, Data Analytics .

- Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng công cụ ETL: DataStage, SSIS, ODI, Informatica,.. 

- Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng Data Model BI, Data Visualization.

- Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các công nghệ/dịch vụ: Kafka, Kinesis, Athena, Redshift, BigQuery, Click House

title: Performance and Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Job Summary:

Produce and oversee the accurate and timely delivery of investment performance figures across the organization. Build analytical reports and provide automated solutions for complex workflows within the Risk department.

Responsibilities:
• Prepare metrics for the fund risk matrices on a quarterly basis.
• Provide inputs to liquidity models for stress testing reports on a quarterly basis.
• Oversee the performance and risk systems within the department and manage complex works flows.
• Review and ensure accurate production of performance returns and analytical information across portfolios.
• Investigate and resolve return differences by working with systems vendors and various departments.
• Interpret and explain performance attribution results.
• Build and prepare analytical performance reports.
• Build analytical solutions and visualizations within the department including trending statistics and outlier reports.
• Work with departments to identify data sources and... pull information to build consolidated data sets.
• Provide automated solutions within the department.
• Manage complex workflows, data sets and time series information.

Experience Requirements:
• At least 3 years of experience in the fields of financial, banking, securities, or information technology
• Must be able to code in SQL, R and/or Python and demonstrate the level of ability.
• Must have strong analytical skills, attention to detail and can work under tight deadlines.
• Understanding of financial markets and investment management is a plus.
• Understanding of fund accounting, performance calculation methodologies is a plus.
• Must be proficient in English and Vietnamese.

Education Requirements:

Holds an undergraduate degree or master’s degree in computer science, math, engineering, auditing, or business.

If you are ready to join this exciting opportunity, please click on the APPLY BUTTON, alternatively, you can contact Ms. Phuong Tran via email to phuong.tran@adecco.com for immediate consideration

description:
Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us

Attractive package
Flexible Working Arrangement
The Job

Lazada Customer Care team is transforming from backend support to a trusted advisor team with the Voice of Customer & Data (VoC & Data) team as one of the Core functions to provide data analysis & insight to understand/ predict customer needs and priorities. This role will focus on helping the team to access the right data and provide consultancy based on data findings.

Report to the Head of VoC & Data, your responsibility:
• Work with local CC teams (including BPO performance, Buyer& Seller Support, Buyer& Seller Experience, and VoC) to identify the business needs and provide relevant support with dashboard/report/ analysis/ insights by:
• Identifying, analyzing, and interpreting trends or patterns in complex data sets.
• Consulting and proposing improvements to all CC teams using data insight.
• Working with management to prioritize business and information needs.
• Locating and identifying new... process improvement opportunities.
• Monitoring data trends and escalating to respective stakeholders.
• Work with the Regional CC team to ensure data are corrected and aligned.
• Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
• Coach and develop junior members within the Data team.

Your Skills and Experience

Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree (or above) majoring in statistics, mathematics, computing, business analytics, or related fields.
• At least 5 years of proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst. Experience in managing a team is a plus.
• Technical expertise in data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques.
• Strong knowledge of and experience with databases (Pythons, SQL, etc.), and programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks).
• Excellent presentation skills and strong knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (MS Excel). Able to translate complex ideas and data into simpler and understandable communication.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy. Critical Thinking, adept at queries, report writing, and presenting findings.
• An ability to think ahead and plan over a 3-9-month time span.
• Strong customer orientation, attention to detail and can work under tight deadlines.
• Familiar with Power BI/ Aspect/ SnapEngage/ Salesforce Platform.

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Attractive package, receive a full salary in the probation period
• Flexible Working Arrangement
• Laptop/ Macbook provided
• Premium medical insurance for you and your family (Critical Illness Insurance included)
• Comfortable working hours in the office, no dress code
• Strong ownership, teamwork and dynamic culture
• Plenty of career growth opportunities, and a personal development system for both specialists and managers

title: Data Analyst (SQL, Python)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
• International & collaborative culture
• Opportunities to grow professionally
• Attractive performance incentives

Job Description

As we accumulate data from millions of young learners worldwide, we need to understand their learning journey and be able to share the right insight for parents, teachers, schools and school funding organisation.

You will be part of a global Analytics team supporting local scope and stakeholders. You will be supporting locally various business and product stakeholders by creating reports and dashboards that will be integrated in the KidsLoop platform and products and by providing actionable insights and recommendations to improve the learning process for KidsLoop users and customers in Vietnam. You will work closely with global data teams such as data engineering, data science and applied science to identify appropriate analytics solutions and provide input on local specifics. As a Data Analyst you will be one of the main... contributors to Data Quality and Integrity best practices, supporting data investigation, research and data management, troubleshooting and investigating data anomalies and issues, working directly with the data engineers to follow through and get the issues fixed. You will also assist in building predictive systems to help understand learner behaviour and educator support.

This is a great opportunity for someone who is interested in joining a lean, innovative group with the possibility of tremendous career development in data engineering, data science & analytics and data asset management.

Your Skills and Experience

Your Responsibilities
• Data collection: identify the data needs and requirements based on business/ product problems; collect data from a variety of sources and define new collection techniques where needed; manage metadata
• Data management: assess data quality and support data integrity initiatives; handle confidential information responsibly; create mechanisms for exploring structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data
• Manage local business/ product/ education stakeholders to understand business problems and liaise with a global data teams to identify appropriate analytical solutions to address them
• Conduct detailed data analysis/modelling; identify patterns in data & generate actionable insights from the available information to support business or product decisions
• Examine trends to generate hypotheses and recommendations to respond to student, parent, teacher, school, organisation, or government needs and goals
• Design KPIs, diagnostic metrics and benchmarks, including setting effective targets to drive optimal outcomes
• Create reports and dashboards to share insights with company customers and partners

Required Qualifications:
• Bachelor’s degree in a field like information technology, computer science, statistics, or mathematics
• Minimum of 2 years working experience in technical data analysis, data science, or data warehousing with proven business / product analysis experience. Product Analytics experience is a plus
• Experience working with Big Data/ unstructured data. Strong SQL, experience with python for data analysis. Experience working with cloud data platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure) is a plus
• Strong analytical skills, translating business problems into analytical questions and creating analytical solutions to address them
• Strong ownership, stakeholder management and prioritisation skills. Experience working with distributed teams is a plus
• Strong visualisation skills (Power BI, Tableau, Looker, etc.)
• Excellent presentation, writing, and storytelling skills are a must
• Passionate about data and data-driven culture

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Competitive compensation with attractive performance incentives
• Fun energetic team; international & collaborative culture
• Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance
• 5 working days per week
• Opportunities to grow professionally and play a critical role to shape the next stage of the company’s growth
• Experience the true spirit of a fast-growing and well funded UK EdTech Company

Work Experience

Language Skill

title: Junior Data Analyst (Database, SQL)
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
We are looking for aJunior Data Analyst to join our Ho Chi Minh City team!

The Junior Data Analyst contributes to GeoGuard’s success by providing customers with intel regarding their users based on information and data gathered through the back office of our systems. This position reports to the Business Data Analyst Lead on a day-to-day basis.

Key responsibilities accountabilities include (but not limited to):
• Design and perform manual data analysis on live production data for detection of data anomalies and anti-fraud purposes
• Monitor release and development to foresee any issues that may arise in future
• Develop and maintain test plans, test cases and checklists related to the anti-fraud and compliance
• Perform manual acceptance testing of new features ahead of product releases
• Stay informed of configuration, deployment, and database changes to ensure analytics tools are always working as expected
• Ensure future browser and operating system releases will not interfere... with fraud detection solutions
• Data analysis and visualisation; review production statistics and forecast potential problem areas
• Review and analyze existing anti-fraud dashboards, tools, and reports, as a means of improving manual review methodologies
• Research and investigate new geo-blocking bypass methodologies
• Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the company’s technologies, process and teams
• Understand company’s vision, goals and strategy; actively contribute to the achievement of the goals and execution of the company’s strategy
• Accurately report hours spent on tasks in Jira
• Commit to agreed deadlines
• At least 1 year of experience in a relevant field
• Bachelor degree with good results in Business Information Systems, Finance, Commerce, Economics, or similar majors
• Good command in Microsoft Excel
• Knowledge of and experience with databases (SQL etc), visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, Kibana) is a plus
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Enjoy working with numerical data
• Ability to work in small collaborative teams in a dynamic working environment
• Good communication and interpersonal skills when working with the team
• Sound experience in performing both QA testing and data analytics; the ability to look beyond testing tasks and think ‘outside the box’
• Comfortable with Android, iOS, MacOS, and Windows is a plus
• Ability to analyze and interpret complex documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards and regulations).
• Ability to work under tight timelines
• Intermediate written and spoken technical English, enough to discuss issues with teams remotely

If you have what we are looking for and would love to join our team in Vietnam, we want to hear from you! This position is located in HCMC, Vietnam and the successful candidate must be able and willing to travel.

We sincerely thank all applicants for applying; if we like what we see and feel you are a match for our position, we will be in touch

description:
Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 155,000 employees who are committed to safe, responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world. This position is in Cargill’s animal nutrition and health business, where we improve lives through better nutrition. Our team researches, innovates and creates solutions that deliver healthy results for our customers.

Job Purpose and Impact

The Master Data Analyst will be responsible to execute on our master data setup and maintenance. We seek a skilled analyst who will partner with all business functions and the corporate global information technology organization to lead and execute the business data requirements.

Key Accountabilities
• Support data and process improvement efforts, including the identification, re-design, and implementation of opportunities identified utilizing data from audits and metrics.
• Monitor master data overall health of the data and execute cleansing... efforts.
• Partner with functional leaders to ensure compliance with data processes and procedures.
• Handle basic issues and problems under direct supervision, while escalating more complex issues to appropriate staff.
• Other duties as assigned

Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications
• Bachelor's degree in a related field or equivalent experience
• Other minimum qualifications may apply
Preferred Qualifications
• Previous experience leading, organizing, and presenting within groups
• Work experience across multiple lines of business and/or within the information technology function
• Experience with data processes for enterprise resource planning (ERP) systems
• Two years in a relevant business experience

title: Data Analyst/ Senior Data Analyst (Statistics/Python/BI...
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Overview:

The Agoda Content department is currently looking for a curious and questioning self-starter and proactive analyst, who will help drive decision making with insights from content, marketing and partner performance data.

You will get the opportunity to own analytical projects to direct our department’s focus, and prioritize our actions. By joining Agoda, you will become part of a truly international team, with leading experts of different backgrounds coming from 50... countries around the world. This is a genuine opportunity to gain valuable experience in a challenging and cutting-edge tech environment. The ideal candidate would have a passion for high-converting content, great user-experience, data and analysis tools and methods. This position reports to the Associate Director of Content Operations, in Bangkok, Thailand.

Main responsibilities:
• Understand Content goals and KPIs and be able to align reports and insights based on them. Identify and investigate trends, anomalies and opportunities to improve Agoda’s Content strategy
• Identify content opportunities that drive customer value, bookings and conversion
• Help build business cases around the opportunity and get buy-in from stakeholders
• Ensure appropriate data/tools/dashboards to measure execution and enable deeper analysis
• Track execution and report up in regular updates
• Work with product, data/BI team and IT to create data resources and build appropriate reporting
• Work with Content team leads to understand their business needs and identify opportunities in terms of team actions prioritization and focus
• Use multiple data sources to report Content projects insights and impact; support Content tests and experiments
• Encourage and train the Content team in best practice use of Agoda data, analysis techniques and interpretation
• Coordinate with other Cross Functional departments like Analytics, Partner Services, and Product Owners
• Use Web-Analytics for Research and Analysis

Requirements:
• Bachelor degree or higher
• 2+ years of relevant experience
• Experience / knowledge in statistics, SQL, Python/R, Tableau and advanced Excel – required
• Ability to demonstrate data manipulation using data warehouse and create meaningful insight and visualization
• Experience / knowledge in Vertica and / or Impala – advantage
• Experience in generating data and / or preparing experiments for product development – advantage

Professional characteristics:
• Attentive to detail and committed to data integrity
• Keen and curious nature; able and willing to share your opinion
• Organized; able to manage multiple, competing priorities and deliver results under tight deadlines
• Able to communicate effectively; fluent in English – both spoken and written

Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region's largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.

At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.

title: SENIOR BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE OFFICER (BI/DATA ANALYST)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About the job

The “Why”

Mekong is partnering with some of the fastest growing consumer businesses in Vietnam. Standing from the Vision of Mekong and its investee companies, we are looking for a motivated talent to join our Digital Transformation team to cause breakthrough results in an agile environment. Our commitment is to build the best BI & Data analytics capability in Vietnam.

We consider ourselves as high-performance team players, the engine of growth, digital transformers and accelerator of breakthrough performance.

The Role

The Senior Business Intelligence Officer (BI/Data Analyst) will partner with multiple internal stakeholders at Mekong Capital to ask the right questions in order to develop insightful, practical and actionable dashboards.

This role requires strong technical and communication skills in order to succeed:
• Collection of user requirements and prioritizing them based on importance, difficulty, and relevance.
• Strong listening skills (especially getting... and understanding underlying intention of visual displays)
• Strong technical skills:
• PowerBI (must)
• SQL (preferred)
• Experience with Datawarehouse (Queries) in Azure Synapse
• Work with different senior stakeholders well (C- & Director Level)
• Understand how to present data self-explanatory, visually appealing, and with consistent labeling
• Excellent communication skills with a variety of senior stakeholder
• Can present data in an engaging, insightful and actionable manner
• Work & operate in an agile environment and participate in all agile ceremonies

What you will need

Ways Of Beings

Being a growth member with a data-driven mindset
• Enrollment of stakeholders and active listening to their intentions and/or pain points & needs
• Expert at asking the right questions and being inquisitive to ensure that the output is actionable, practical and functional · Strong fit with our core values.
• Being a partner and working collaboratively with senior stakeholders and investee’s team members to co-create technical solutions that fulfill the vision of the company
• Continuous growth mindset and identifying any technology opportunities and innovations to support business improvements

Experience & Expertise

We prefer character over skills – for this position we do require strong fundamental & technical skills to succeed in this position:

Bachelor’s Degree with 5 years of industry experience and professional experience in solution development using a combination of PowerBI (or Tableau) and SQL
• Strong listening skills to collect the intention of key user and their requirements
• Strong skills to present data accurately, insightful, beautifully and an excellent communicator
• Experience with a proven track record in building dashboards using technologies such as Power BI and Azure Synapse

title: Data Analyst / Data Research Engineer
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Job Description
• Use statistical methods to analyze data and generate useful business reports.
• Work with product and management team to create a prioritized list of needs for each business segment.
• Identify and recommend new ways to save cost by streamlining business processes.
• Use data to create models that depict trends, anomalies in the customer base and the consumer population as a whole.
• Developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
• Acquiring data from primary or secondary data sources and maintaining databases.
• Work with departmental managers to outline the specific data needs for each business method analysis project.
• Write research reports to transfer knowledge.
• Collaborate and work effectively with multiple internal teams (creative design, marketing, product) to understand and help them figure out insight from data.

Requirements
• BS or Master in Mathematics... Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics.
• Ability to collaborate effectively and work as part of a team.
• Strong attention to detail.
• Proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst (1+ years’ Data mining experience or 1+ years in a data analyst role).
• Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining, and segmentation techniques.
• Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (matplotlib/seaborn, ggplot...) and other visualization tools (Tableau, DataStudio, Looker…).
• Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (statsmodels, SciPy,... ).
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy.
• Demonstrated experience in handling large data sets and relational databases.
• Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings.

Benefits
• Working time: from Monday to Friday
• Health care insurance and social insurance.
• Performance based bonus
• Training courses (but at the Company’s sole discretion).
• Strong learning environment.
• Free snacks – Team activities.
• Working equipment to be provided

title: Business Intelligence Leader
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
JOB DESCRIPTION

1. Recommending, warning unusual of transactions and systems:
• Analyzing system logic and business model properties, make transaction alert proposals, collaborating with Software Development department to conduct feasibility tests, apply to alerts.
• Ensuring alerts are checked daily and respond automatically.
• Ensuring the logic is constantly and fully updated according to the change in the behavior of users & customers.
• Ensuring the synchronization of complete and accurate data from BI database to the system data warehouse.

2. Providing data, reports, analysis for all departments, BOD, investor (BI):
• Being responsible for the data of senior & junior BI provided to departments
• Being responsible for making in-depth reports for BOD and investors.
• Checking, training and guiding senior & junior BI make reports.

3. Providing in-depth analysis, giving solutions (BI):
• Proactively analyzing issues related to the company‘s business model.
• Building, maintaining... and ensuring that the company‘s operating metrics are constantly updated (key metrics).

4. Building and structuring data systems according to the company‘s operating model:
• Being responsible for building the data architecture of the BI team.
• Updating continuously data tables for operation.
• Ensuring the processing speed of data provided to departments and reports in Clouds.

5. Checking and validating the data for sales promotions, product campaigns (BI):
• Taking responsibility for the results of sales promotions and campaigns for products.
• Building and designing automated test systems

REQUIREMENT
• 5 years experience at Business Intelligence, Data Analyst or Equivalent Experience
• Strong with SQL, MS SQL, Big Query are compulsory
• Strong with procedural languages: SQL stored procedures for multiple server architectures –
• Familiar with dbt, Airbyte, AirFlow
• 3 years experience with Visualization Tools: MS Power BI, Tableau, GG studio
• 3 years experience in Banking/Finance/E-commerce/Insurance/AI/Fintech Industry
• Fluency in English communication (both verbal communication and presenting)
• Good at communication and critical thinking
• Strong sense of business acumen
• Experience in team management at least 1 year is plus
• Experience in Python is a big plus
• Focus on results and actions oriented
• Flexible, willing to learn and have “Can-Do” attitude
• Cooperation, hardworking, persistent and highly trustworthy

BENEFITS
• Deserving allowance package adequate with candidate’s competency.
• 13th Salary + Annual KPI.
• Salary review every year.
• Opportunity to own a laptop.
• Participate fully in social and health insurance according to the Law.
• Participate in additional Health Insurance Package.
• Bonus/Gift on holidays.
• Excellent Team Building experience.
• Have fun to the max in happy-hours session once per month with many internal fascinating programs.
• For two years with MFast, you will have one more leave day.

ABOUT MFAST:

MFast is the leading tech-enabled agent banking network that aims to democratize financial access to the underserved population in Vietnam and emerging Southeast Asia. The company is currently backed by prominent investors, including Ascend Vietnam Ventures, Wavemaker, Jafco Asia, Do Ventures, etc.

In the long-run, MFast aspires to be an all-in-one agent banking platform for the unbanked and underbanked population. Our mission is to increase financial inclusion for people throughout SouthEast Asia, not just in Vietnam

title: Data Engineer SQL, Python
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Competitive Salary
Flexible and quality working environment
Employee Stock option
The Job

Job brief
• We are looking for an experienced data engineer to join our team. You will use various methods to transform raw data into useful data systems. For example, you’ll create algorithms and conduct statistical analysis. Overall, you’ll strive for efficiency by aligning data systems with business goals.
• To succeed in this data engineering position, you should have strong analytical skills and the ability to combine data from different sources. Data engineer skills also include familiarity with several programming languages and knowledge of learning machine methods.
• If you are detail-oriented, with excellent organizational skills and experience in this field, we’d like to hear from you.

Responsibilities
• Build data systems and pipelines
• Evaluate business needs and objectives
• Interpret trends and patterns
• Conduct complex data analysis and report on... results
• Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modeling
• Build algorithms and prototypes
• Combine raw information from different sources
• Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability
• Identify opportunities for data acquisition
• Develop analytical tools and programs
• Collaborate with data scientists and architects on several projects

Your Skills and Experience
• Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role
• Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques
• Knowledge of programming languages (e.g. Java and Python)
• Hands-on experience with SQL database design
• Great numerical and analytical skills
• Degree in Computer Science, IT, or similar field; a Master’s is a plus
• Data engineering certification (e.g IBM Certified Data Engineer) is a plus

Why You'll Love Working Here

What we offer:
• Bao Viet Healthcare insurance.
• 100% gross salary in probation
• 100% statutory insurance as per the labor law
• Good chance to study and develop career path stably.
• Quality work environment, flexibility, being innovative and rewarded for efforts.
• You will be able to join our ESOP (Employee Stock Option Program) allowing you to financially share in our future success
