title: Data Lake Developer
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
via: qua Đại Học FPT Cần Thơ
description:
Data Lake Developer

WHAT WE CAN OFFER

Hưởng mức lương cạnh tranh thị trường cùng các khoản thưởng hợp lý khác tương xứng với sự đóng góp. Lương từ: $1.200

Đào tạo chuyên sâu, nâng cao kiến thức cho nhân viên với các chuyên gia đầu ngành

Lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng phù hợp cho từng vị trí hoặc từng cá nhân

JOB DESCRIPTION

A member of Data Lake team, responsible to build, develop and maintain the data pipeline of our strategic Big Data platform, Data Lake serving for management needs, business operations of the bank and comply with Data Governance.

MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES:

– Develop and maintain scalable and reliable data pipelines to ingest data from a variety of different data sources into Data Lake, ensure the right data format and adhere to data quality standards, and assure the downstream users can get the data quickly

– Develop and maintain highly scalable and extensible Big Data platform which enables collection, storage, modeling, and analysis of massive data sets from... numerous channels. Define and maintain data pipeline, data structure, data format to enable business solution

– Develop and enable big data and batch/real-time analytical solutions that leverage emerging technologies.

– Works in a team to build next-generation Hadoop data lake and analytics applications on a group of core Hadoop technologies

– Evaluate new technologies and products, and research to identify opportunities that impact business strategy, business requirements and performance that can accelerate access to data.

– Work with Advanced Analytics Team to plan and execute high-impact actionable insight generation through big data advanced analytics including predictive analytics, advanced Machine Learning Technologies that reduce cost and improve analytics speed to insight by accelerating the pace of Big Data innovation at ACB.

– Ensure proper configuration management and change controls are implemented during code migration.

JOB REQUIREMENTS

REQUIREMENTS:

1. Educational Qualifications

Bachelor Degree in Information Technology/Data Management/Big Data/ Information system.

2. Relevant Knowledge/ Expertise

– At least 3 years experience in any following data analysis programming languages: Python, R, Java, Scalar, Spark is a must. Knowledgeable in at least any web programming languages is a big plus

– Experience in multinational project, cross-functional engineering teams is a plus.

3. Skills

– Ability of reading, understanding IT materials in English

– Ability of communicating in English. IELTS 6.5 and above, or TOEIC 700 and above is a plus

– Good in thinking, observing and analytics

– Ability of presenting idea to non-technical people

– Flexibility, and adaptability in this fast-growing environment

– Knowledgeable about anything of finance, accounting, business, e-commerce, insurance, securities is preferred.

4. Relevant Experiences

– 2+ years of overall IT experience including the following:

– Experience in evolving/managing technologies/tools in a rapidly changing environment to support business needs and capabilities

– Experience with backend microservice, Cloud Computing such as Google, AWS and big data projects in the financial industry is a plus

5. Personal Characteristics

– Hard-working, proactive, creative, and patient

– High compliance and paying attention to detail.

– Willing to learn more, and adapt quickly to new things (because the process, management requirements, technology, …change frequently)

LIÊN HỆ & NỘP HỒ SƠ

title: Data Analyst Intern
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
VỀ YOUNET MEDIA

YouNet Media là một công ty thành viên thuộc YouNet Group - tổ hợp Công Nghệ Mạng Xã Hội (SocialTech) mang lại giá trị cho doanh nghiệp trong các hoạt động Bán hàng, Tiếp thị và Vận hành.

YouNet Media là công ty tiên phong và dẫn đầu về nền tảng & dịch vụ phân tích dữ liệu Mạng Xã Hội (Social Media Analytics) tại Việt Nam, sở hữu các nền tảng bao gồm SocialHeat (nền tảng Social Listening), SocialLift (nền tảng phân tích KOLs/Influencers) và Social Trend (nền tảng phân tích xu hướng).

Chúng tôi tự hào là đối tác tin cậy của hơn 500 thương hiệu toàn cầu và hàng đầu tại Việt Nam (Nestle, Samsung, Yamaha, Prudential , Manulife…).

1. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
• * Sử dụng phần mềm để đọc và phân loại các bài viết, thảo luận trên mạng xã hội của đa ngành hàng. Bao gồm: xác định các thông tin có giá trị, phân loại cảm xúc phản hồi của người dùng về sản phẩm, phân loại tính chất sản phẩm,.. theo yêu cầu.
• Sử dụng phần mềm để thu thập, kéo dữ liệu công khai trên mạng xã hội về hệ... thống.
• Hỗ trợ các công việc khác theo yêu cầu

2. YÊU CẦU
• * Thực tập 3 tháng - toàn thời gian từ Thứ 2 - Thứ 6: 8h30 - 12h00 & 13h30 - 18h00.
• Sinh viên năm 3 hoặc 4, không yêu cầu ngành học và kinh nghiệm, sẽ được training khi nhận việc.
• Có kỹ năng phân tích và tổng hợp thông tin.
• Ưu tiên ứng viên yêu thích công việc trên máy tính.
• Cẩn thận, kiên nhẫn, tỉ mỉ, ham học hỏi, có tinh thần trách nhiệm và tự giác.

3. QUYỀN LỢI
• * Có phụ cấp thực tập: 3.000.000 vnđ/ tháng
• Gửi xe miễn phí tại tòa nhà
• Có hỗ trợ dấu mộc, một số tài liệu thực tập theo quy định của công ty
• Được học hỏi và tiếp thu từ công việc thực tế trong việc phân loại dữ liệu từ các nền tảng xã hội phục vụ cho marketing.
• Tham gia hoạt động của công ty: ngày lễ, tiệc, team building, …
• Được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, vui vẻ và hòa đồng, tham gia các buổi chia sẻ kiến thức và xu hướng marketing

title: Senior Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Mô tả công việc

• Xây dựng, phát triển và duy trì trang tổng quan tự động để theo dõi các chỉ số hiệu suất
• Theo dõi và xác định các vấn đề tiềm ẩn, các cơ hội để tối ưu hóa từ tất cả các bảng điều khiển / báo cáo
• Thông báo tình trạng của doanh nghiệp cho các bên liên quan thường xuyên - cho phép người nghe hiểu rõ lý do đằng sau các xu hướng - và cung cấp thông tin chi tiết để thúc đẩy các quyết định chiến lược
• Đề xuất các cải tiến / khuyến nghị dựa trên thông tin chi tiết về dữ liệu
• Tiến hành phân tích khám phá - đi sâu vào dữ liệu để phát triển các giả thuyết và trả lời các câu hỏi kinh doanh phức tạp
• Có nhiệm vụ phân tích khác theo yêu cầu
• Các hình thức phân tích bao gồm: phân khúc khách hàng; phân tích để tăng cường chuyển đổi, tương tác, chuyển đổi, giữ chân người dùng; tiêu chuẩn hóa báo cáo; trò chơi hóa; Thử nghiệm A / B & phân tích thử nghiệm để tối ưu hóa tiếp... thị

Yêu cầu ứng viên
• Kinh nghiệm 2 năm ở vị trí tương đương
• Có kiến thức về thống kê và kinh nghiệm sử dụng các gói thống kê để phân tích tập dữ liệu
• Mạnh về kĩ năng phân tích (thu thập, phân tích, chuyển đổi dữ liệu thô thành thông tin chi tiết)
• Có kinh nghiệm với các Tools Visualization (Google Data Studio / Power BI/ Tableau)
• Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng ngôn ngữ Python, SQL

Quyền lợi

Mức lương: Mức lương : cạnh tranh
• Hệ thống thưởng đa dạng: tháng (đột xuất), quý, năm, thưởng lương tháng 13, 14, 15... (theo kết quả doanh thu của Công ty);
• Phúc lợi tốt cho nhân viên và gia đình: bảo hiểm y tế, du lịch, team building, happy hour, happy birthday…
• Ứng viên khi trở thành nhân viên công ty sẽ được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ của người lao động theo quy định của Luật lao động Việt Nam;
• Thưởng các dịp Lễ Tết: Tết Dương lịch, 08/03, 01/05, 02/09, 20/10, Trung thu...
• Bảo hiểm xã hội và bảo hiểm sức khỏe (PVI) theo chế độ Công ty, khám sức khỏe định kỳ;
• Quỹ du lịch Team Builiding hàng quý;
• Môi trường trẻ năng động, hiện đại, nhiều cơ hội phát triển bản thân;
• Chính sách đào tạo hấp dẫn nhằm phát triển kiến thức chuyên môn và hoàn thiện kỹ năng mềm;
• Các chế độ khác theo chính sách nội bộ của công ty.

Cách thức ứng tuyển

Ứng viên nộp hồ sơ trực tuyến bằng cách bấm Ứng tuyển ngay dưới đây.

ỨNG TUYỂN NGAY

LƯU TIN

title: [HCM] Tập Đoàn Kiểm Toán Đa Quốc Gia PwC Tuyển Dụng Chuyên Viên...
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Mô tả công việc & Tóm tắt
Sự nghiệp trong lĩnh vực Công nghệ Thông tin, trong Dịch vụ Công ty Nội bộ, sẽ cung cấp cho bạn cơ hội hỗ trợ các chức năng kinh doanh cốt lõi của chúng tôi bằng cách triển khai các ứng dụng cho phép nhân viên của chúng tôi làm việc hiệu quả hơn và cung cấp dịch vụ cao nhất cho khách hàng của chúng tôi. Bạn sẽ tập trung vào việc quản lý việc thiết kế và triển khai cơ sở hạ tầng công nghệ trong PwC, phát triển và nâng cao cả ứng dụng khách hàng và ứng dụng nội bộ trong PwC, đồng thời cung cấp các công cụ công nghệ giúp tạo ra lợi thế cạnh tranh cho Công ty để thúc đẩy tăng trưởng kinh doanh chiến lược.

Đội ngũ của chúng tôi cung cấp hỗ trợ kỹ thuật từ xa và cập nhật công nghệ thông tin cho nhân viên của PwC. Bạn sẽ cung cấp giải pháp cho các nhu cầu kỹ thuật, đề xuất sửa đổi hoặc cải tiến quy trình và báo cáo các vấn đề kỹ thuật chưa được giải quyết cho bên thích hợp.

Mô tả công việc:
• Phối hợp lập kế hoạch & kiểm soát CNTT - hợp nhất ngân sách hàng năm... phân tích tài chính (lập ngân sách so với chi tiêu), phân phối chống lại kế hoạch.
• Phối hợp báo cáo quản lý - địa phương / toàn cầu.
• Hỗ trợ thành phần truyền thông CNTT sáng tạo & định hướng kinh doanh.
• Đầu mối liên hệ với toàn cầu về phần mềm và dịch vụ được quản lý.
• Hỗ trợ quy trình chính & các hoạt động tuân thủ, ví dụ: Chính sách bảo mật thông tin (ISP), tiêu chuẩn mạng.
• Hỗ trợ người cao niên và Quản lý xử lý các dự án
• Cung cấp các chức năng hỗ trợ CNTT một cách chuyên nghiệp
• Báo cáo cho trưởng nhóm Hỗ trợ Chiến lược.

Yêu cầu:

Giáo dục:
• Tốt nghiệp đại học ngành Hệ thống thông tin kinh doanh hoặc lĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tin liên quan.
• Có kiến thức về phân tích kinh doanh & quản lý / báo cáo tài chính.

Kinh nghiệm làm việc:
• Sinh viên mới tốt nghiệp với ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc liên quan.

Kiến thức kỹ thuật & chuyên môn:
• Năng động, định hướng thành tích và kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt.
• Kiến thức & kinh nghiệm về các công cụ văn phòng MS (Alteryx & PowerBI a plus).
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp tuyệt vời bằng cả tiếng Anh viết và nói.
• Kỹ năng phân tích, thuyết trình và tư duy chiến lược tốt.
• Có thể làm việc độc lập và chịu áp lực trong môi trường nhịp độ nhanh, với lịch trình chặt chẽ và hướng dẫn tuân thủ nghiêm ngặt.
• Sáng tạo với kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề mạnh mẽ.
• Đói để học một phải.

Ứng tuyển

TẠI ĐÂY

title: Data Analyst (Middle-Senior) SIGN ON BONUS 30M
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
OVERVIEW

We are actively looking for a Data Analyst / Data Scientist to join the development team. Work with US

clients and help them solve their toughest data analytics and insight challenges. You will primarily work

with clients in the Manufacturing industry – commercial metals, metals recycling. You will have a chance to work with our proactive and talented people with great teamwork, and an open and respectful working environment. At our company, you will be working with the latest technology, you will have the chance to advance and grow your career.

WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING

● Design and implement relevant data models in the form of data stored in data warehouses and

data lakes.

● Build data pipelines to bring information from source systems and cleanse data to support

analytics initiatives for core business metrics and performance trends.

● Dive into company data to identify sources and features that will drive business objectives, then

present the suggested data model and... virtualization to project stakeholders.

● Work closely with Domain Architecture, Business Consultants, Data Engineer, and other team

members to provide regular status reporting and support them to refine issues/problem

statements and propose/evaluate relevant analytics solutions.

● Bring your experience and ideas to effective and innovative engineering, design and strategy.

● Work with development teams to virtualize data in BI tools such as PowerBi, Tableau and custom

web-based dashboards.

● Collaborate with multiple teams and own the solution end-to-end.

REQUIREMENTS

● At least 2-5 years of relevant IT software experience relating to large-scale data integration/ETL.

● Have working experience with programming languages such as Python, R, MATLAB.

● Have experience of working with analytics platforms (Tableau, Microsoft or Oracle BI, etc.).

● Strong knowledge and skills with SQL and relational and non-relational databases.

● Good at unit testing and integration test strategies.

● Must be able to multi-task and deal with changing priorities.

● Able to work independently and willing to support others.

● Good skills in English and the ability to communicate with business and technical teams.

● Good at communication and presentation skills, including the ability to clearly articulate the

solution and implications of a complex model to all types of project stakeholders.

NICE TO HAVE

● Be able to research and apply Machine Learning and other technologies to implement

Data-Prediction and Modelling.

● Knowledge of working with cloud-based data warehouse and data lake services such as Azure

Data Lake, and Azure Data Factory.

● Beginning familiarity and applied Machine Learning tools/frameworks for analyzing data such as

Tensorflow, and NLP models.

WORKING WITH US

Innomize’s vision is to create an ideal and open environment where each employee is eager to work and encouraged by their creative ability. We collaborate with our coworkers and clients to achieve better results that matter. Once you become an Innomizer, you’ll begin to experience our journey towards creating an inspiring environment for your development both personally and professionally. We’ll give you our super hot benefits including:

● 13th payment, and extra bonus for excellent employees.

● Latest tech tools and fully equipped working facilities.

● Fascinating employee engagement and entertainment activities.

● Enjoying diverse activities: Snack every day, Happy Hour weekly, monthly Friday BBQ, Company

trip, Year-end Party, Games, Team building, Football and Badminton Club weekly,…

● Special bonus on Public holidays.

● Career guidance and support daily from Manager, Leader and Senior Level.

● Opportunity to learn and grow with internal training weekly: English, Technology and Soft skills.

● Overtime is rarely required, you will get paid for the extra work.

ABOUT US

In 2018 we kicked off our journey with great vision and never-ending enthusiasm. People are our

company’s greatest asset so we are constantly learning in-depth knowledge and are always open to new approaches to create a supportive environment that will accommodate our employee’s personal and professional growth plans. We always look for like-minded people to be a part of our warmest team. Are you ready to actively join our projects

title: Senior Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About GeoComply

We’re GeoComply! We're a market-leading, hyper-growth technology provider with teams across five countries and three continents with a global customer base. And we have no plans to slow down.

Achieving 650% growth in annual revenue over the past three years and dubbed a tech “Unicorn,” we’re revolutionizing how people and businesses use the internet to instill confidence in every online interaction. Trusted by leading brands and regulators for the past ten years, our geolocation solutions are installed on over 400 million devices and analyze over 10 billion transactions a year.

At the heart of it all is the people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees and partners, and providing for the needs of our customers.

We are looking for a Senior Data Analyst to join our team in HCMC, Vietnam who will match our ambitions, and help us Better ourselves and achieve our goals.

The Senior Data Analyst role contributes to... GeoComply’s success by developing, enhancing rules for our products and providing quality analyses based on data collected from our end customers, as well as providing insights to help business and technical teams make informed decisions. This position reports and takes direction from Data Analytics Lead on a day-to-day basis.

What You Will Be Doing
• Propose new idea/report to detect potential spoofing intention
• Present the findings and suggestions to the business team regularly in the Weekly Anti-Fraud Call with Vancouver and Ukraine Team at 10pm on Thursday
• Peer review and improve rule suggestions of other team members
• Actively research the new updates of mobile operating systems and apply them to spoofing detection
• Perform manual data analysis and visualization on live production data for detection of geolocation data anomalies and anti-fraud purposes
• Design and script reports based on technical and business requirements.
• Monitor release, configuration, and database changes.
• Contribute to the growth of the team by suggesting ideas and new practices to improve manual review methodologies.
• Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the company’s technologies, processes, and teams
• Understand the company’s vision, goals and strategy; actively contribute to the achievement of the goals and execution of the company’s strategy

About You
• Bachelor’s degree with good results in Computer Science, Statistics, Engineering, or similar majors.
• Good command in Microsoft Excel
• Strong knowledge of and proven experience with databases (SQL, MongoDB, etc), programming (Python or other languages), visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, Kibana)
• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
• Minimum 4 years experience in a similar role
• Excellent written and spoken English
• Good communication and interpersonal skills when working with the team
• Strong technical skills, comfortable with Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows
• Ability to analyze and interpret complex documents (software requirements and design specifications, standards, and regulations).
• Ability to work under a tight timeline
• Enjoy working with numerical data
• Ability to work in small collaborative teams in a dynamic working environment

Bonus Points if You
• Machine learning knowledge/experience is a plus
• Data engineering knowledge/experience is a plus
• GIS experience is a plus

Why GeoComply?

Joining the GeoComply team means you’ll be part of an award-winning company to work, learn and grow. We are fast-paced, high-impact, and have a can-do team culture.

To be successful in our organization, you need an eager attitude, professionalism, and the confidence to willingly work to prove yourself and your ideas, and earn the trust of the organization.

Here’s why we think you’d love working with us.

We’re working towards something big

We’ve built a reputation as the global market leader for geolocation compliance solutions for over 10 years. We’re trusted by customers from all over the world, and the next few years will be particularly exciting as we continue to scale across new markets.

Our values aren’t just a buzzword

Our values are the foundation for what we as a company care about most. They signify the commitment we make to each other around how we act and what we stand for. They are our north star as we work together to build a company we’re all proud to be a part of. Learn more, here .

Diversity, equity, and inclusion are at the core of who we are

In collaboration with our team and external partners, we promote DEI in our recruitment and hiring practices; scholarships and financial aid; training and mentorship programs; employee benefits, and more.

Learning Is At The Heart Of Our Employee Experience

At GeoComply, we foster an environment that empowers every employee to gain the knowledge and abilities needed to perform at their very best and help our organization grow. From a professional development budget to local training opportunities, knowledge-sharing sessions and more, we are continually investing in employee career growth and development.

We believe in being a force for good

We profoundly care about our impact on the world and strive to make meaningful contributions to the communities we work and live in. Our Impact division focuses on philanthropic and social responsibility initiatives, including supporting our local communities, advancing equality, and harnessing our technology to protect vulnerable groups. Learn more, here .

We Care About Our Team

Our GeoComply team is talented, driven and hard-working, and is known for its positive attitude and energy. At GeoComply, we take care of our employees with the total package. Team members are generously rewarded with competitive salaries, incentives, and a comprehensive benefits program.

We value in-person collaboration

The benefits we have seen from teams being together have been tremendous in how we are able to collaborate and swiftly inform each other on what is happening across the company. By introducing an 80% attendance rate, we have seen the value in achieving more together as a company as we continue to foster collaboration across team members and departments.

Apply Now!

Interested in joining our team? Send us your resume and a cover letter. We can’t wait to meet you!

- - - - - - - - - -

At GeoComply, we live our value of Act with Integrity. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion, and we welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities. Creating an accessible interview experience for all candidates is important to us. If you have any requests (big or small) throughout our hiring process, please don’t hesitate to let us know so we can do our best to prioritize your needs.

We care about your privacy and want you to be informed about your rights. Please read our Applicant Privacy Notice before applying for the position

Laidon Group is a Certified SAP Silver Partner. We are singularly focused to advance digital transformation through business process simplification. We know at the heart of the digital transformation is data, specifically trusted data. What we find common is that many companies struggle to implement a scalable and sustainable master data governance solution. It is this challenge that we are proud to introduce SimpleMDG to the SAP ecosystem. By leveraging SAP Cloud Platform services and seamlessly integrating with SAP, SimpleMDG is future-proof and will help companies eliminate on average $15 million annually due to poor data quality.

SimpleMDG is a byproduct of our passion to deliver solutions that are sustainable, meeting the needs of today, and support the needs of the future.

Your role & responsibilities
• Collaborate with functional consultants to understand, summarize and analyze business requirements
• Define logical data models for analysis
• Carry out database population... address data-quality issues, perform data pre-processing, and enrichment using ETL tools
• Conduct analysis and build interactive dashboards/reports with valuable insights, trends, and comparisons using visualization tools
• Perform report validation to assure valid and precise results
• Document dashboard specifications to provide detailed descriptions and guidance to report viewers
• At least 3 - 4 years of experience as a Data Analyst

• Problem-solving skills, Accuracy and attention to detail, Team-working skills

Benefits for you

title: Tikinow - Senior Supply Chain Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Mô tả công việc
About us
At TikiNOW Smart Logistics (TIkiNOW), we‘ve committed ourselves to becoming a trailblazer in bringing AI and advanced technologies to positively transform Logistics to a heightened level.
As a member of TikiNOW, you will gain more knowledge and experience on how an E-commerce system operates, obtain the opportunities to push yourself further by solving problems in a system where millions of orders are sold and delivered to customers, and support the Tiki Express Delivery (TED) team to deliver products to customers in the fastest and most dedicated way.
We are looking for a senior candidate for our role of Supply Chain Planning & Performance Management to take care of the whole of Transportation. This position is critical for the company’s operational excellence, business growth, and profitability.
What you’d contribute:
1. Operations Planning
a. Participate in the planning of resources & operating budget related to warehouse operations, Transportation... distribution, and internal facilities (outsourced transportation costs, fleet costs, etc.)
b. SnOP:
• Conduct data analysis, and collaborate with Commercial teams to build the demand planning between Tiki Commercial and TNSL on Business Units and Commercial Channels
• Manage Demand Forecast scalability and Uplift by Events, promotions, brand days, and Mega Campaign.
• Derive Commercial Targets into market demand on items, parcels levels, workforce & capacity (inbound, outbound, storage, ...) needed to ensure customer orders have the best delivery lead-time
• Analyze data to identify problematic areas and suggest an improvement.
• Plan and implement optimization via governance, and optimal processes.
• Track KPIs and reports on related metrics
2. Network Solution Design/ Improvement & Master projects/ initiatives:
• PIC in collecting & verifying warehouse & transportation resource information of TNSL
• Drive network design/ improvements, assessing the impact on the existing setup and defining the trade-off between customer experience and cost
• Drive the planning, implementation, coordination, and monitoring of operational excellence/ transformation projects/ initiatives related to warehouse/ transportation resource development and distribution activities
• Collaborate with the development teams, be responsible for making project decisions, and achieving tactical goals while retaining a strategic focus
3. Fundamental build-up:
• Set up and standardize KPIs definition & logic/ right measurement. A single channel for clear visibility of FFM & E2E Logistics KPIs
• Proposing quantifiable measures of SC performance goals.
• Analyze the current situation, requirements, and obstacles to propose targets for each measure. Develop procedures and standards for performance evaluation
• Synthesize, analyze and assess the overall performance of the end-to-end logistics process/ overall operational efficiency through the use of activity-based costing (ABC) management for the constituent activities of warehousing, transportation/ other KPIs to quantify project goals/initiatives to realize Supply Chain goals
4. Performance management: Drive FFM & E2E Logistics performance continuous improvement:
• Pro-actively tracking the performance against agreed target and tracking compliance to adherence to defined standards and processes
• Drive/ facilitate operations team’s root causes analysis and corrective action plan in case exceptions happen

Yêu cầu công việc
What you’d have to succeed for the role:
• Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Finance and Economics
• At least 3 years experience in Supply Chain Planning or Logistics/Operation Performance Management.
• Knowledge and understanding of planning systems and BI tools.
• Strong logical thinking, problem-solving mindset & high-level reasoning
• Strong analytic and statistical skills - SQL is a must.
• Well-developed planning, advanced organization and presentation skills
• Ability to manage and lead collaborative partnerships and stakeholders to excellent performance
Nice-to-have experience:
• Preferably in Ecommerce, Logistics & FMCG industry
• Having consulting experience is a big plus
• Python/R is a big plus
Our cool offers:
• Hybrid working
• Attractive package + immediate healthcare insurance
• Fully paid during the probation period
• Social insurances contributions are paid on full salary
• Be coached by experienced & inspirational leaders and managers
• Unlimited access to knowledge via the learning library & via team knowledge-sharing

Quyền lợi được hưởng
Competitive salary
Annual health check-up and premium healthcare
Special internal programs for Tikier

location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Gain very attractive salary and benefits
Be a Developer, not a Coder
Working environment and high promotion opportunity
The Job

1. Role:
• Take the responsibility of providing quality analysis, which can be done, for the production content of Finbase and other subsidiaries.
• Contribute to building and maintaining a dashboard to monitor the performance of subsidiaries and decentralize access.
• Design and development declare data models in the data warehouse.
• Think, discuss with departments about the way to analyze data from different parts of the corporation to build Finbase user system, measure and give important insight.

2. Job Description
• Perform data analysis to provide insight into business performance and KPIs.
• Work with subsidiary business groups to advise and clarify requirements for data and Dashboards.
• Present to BI Leaders and Developers to standardize to technical and statistical requirements.
• Offers a plan and process for the... collection, analysis, and presentation of data, from a variety of sources (Ad Networks, Digital Video, Community, Websites and Marketplace Social Listening tools).
• Transform complex data into understandable, useful information for stakeholders.New proposal for automating data collection or analysis.

Your Skills and Experience
• Graduate from university with a major in Computer Science, IT or Computer Science.
• Minimum 4 years of experience in data analysis, data management and report building.
• Experience with tools and supporting languages ​​for BI/analysis/statistics (Google BigQuery, Google Data Studio, Power BI, Oracle).
• Experience with R or Python is a plus.
• Experience writing complex data queries in SQL or a similar language. Having high analytical skills, able to independently develop plans, propose plans to synthesize and analyze data (both computational and quantitative).
• Good communication ability and strong business mindset, seeing problems not only from a data perspective.
• Ability to explain complex technical terms to corporate stakeholders.Experience in Media or Content Creation is an advantage.

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Very attractive salary with 13th-month salary.
• Performance Bonus from 1 - 3 months salary in gross (based on company's revenue per financial year)
• Mon-Fri flexible working time Leaves

We have more benefits for you:
• From 13 days Annual Leaves per annum

• Occasional gifts (Welcome Kits, Birthday, Anniversary, Wedding, etc.) from the company
• Teambuilding with trekking activities and Company Trip (1-2 times per year)
• Opportunities to join training courses about Financial (Stock Market, Trading, etc.) from company's experts and Management Team
• Laptop is provided.
• A fun & dynamic environment and freedom to be creative.

We work in happiness. Genuine work/life balance served here! Cool activities all the time: beer time, quarterly meeting, team-building, company trip, charity events, sport clubs, etc.

You think you’ve got what it takes? Apply now

WHAT YOU’LL DO
• Perform detailed analysis of business requirements and technical environments and use this in designing high-quality visualization products

• Build and foster a high-performance engineering culture, supervise junior/middle team members and provide them technical leadership
•... Write project documentation

WHAT YOU HAVE
• At least 5 years of relevant development experience and practice with BI platform; data integration, data storage, data modeling and database design technologies; etc
• Hands-on production experience in designing and developing end-to-end production-ready Data Vizualization Solutions in at least one public cloud platform
• Solid background in Data Analytics and Visualization domain, including strong knowledge and experience with data modeling (facts and dimensions)

title: Data Analyst (Remote)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About Seller Candy

At Seller Candy our vision is to Give balance, certainty & peace of mind to e-commerce entrepreneurs. We’re a value driven company that believes our team is as important as our customers. Our core values are; Own-it, Authenticity, Determination, Expertise and Impact through Growth.

To accomplish our vision we remove the daily friction experienced by e-commerce entrepreneurs by handling their Amazon account issues and support cases with agency level expertise and best practices in a fun and collaborative environment.

Seller Candy bridges the gap from “online seller” to business owner. We enable millions of dollars in revenue and free hundreds of people from their jobs, transforming them into confident entrepreneurs accomplishing their dreams.

Seller Candy is in an exciting phase of growth so join us and imagine yourself being part of changing lives!
What you will do

Do you love uncovering the hidden stories that numbers tell? Finding the data behind the... data?

We’re looking for a dedicated number storyteller. As a Seller Candy Data Analyst you will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions.

Primary objectives
• Identifying, analyzing, and interpreting trends or patterns in complex data sets that could be valuable for diagnostic and predictive analytics efforts.
• Work with leadership to prioritize business and information needs
• Designing and maintaining data systems and databases, includes but not limited to: design / fix formula & coding errors and other data-related problems
• Analyzing data using statistical techniques and providing reports
• Locating and defining new process improvement opportunities using operations data including team SLA, budgets and forecast
• Locate and define new process improvement opportunities

What you need
• MUST HAVE working knowledge of MS Excel, Google Sheets, Google Data Studio,
• Experience with MS Access and/or Power BI plus but not required. Willingness to learn required.
• Ability to write in SQL a HUGE plus but not required. Willingness to learn required.
• Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
• Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings
• Attention to detail and with prompt reporting adherence to deadlines
• More than 1 year working experience as a Data Analyst or Business Data Analyst
• High level of English especially for reading
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills

What’s in it for you
• Full time work
• Very high-paying compared to similar roles
• Performance bonuses
• Growth potential within the company
• The amazing opportunity to join a fast growing company who is just as focused on their team as they are on their customers

location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
At Jabil we strive to make ANYTHING POSSIBLE and EVERYTHING BETTER. With over 260,000 diverse, talented and dedicated employees across 100 locations in 30 countries, our vision is to be the most technologically advanced and trusted manufacturing solutions provider. We combine an unmatched breadth and depth of end-market experience, technical and design capabilities, manufacturing know-how, supply chain insights and global product management expertise to enable success for the world’s leading brands. We are driven by a common purpose to make a positive impact for each other, our communities, and the environment.

Execution/Operation

Essential Duties & Responsibilities
• Provides design support for the development of business intelligence solutions.
• Provides design support for the SAP ERP.
• Works on medium to complex and cross-functional IT and business intelligence solutions, e.g., gathering data and analyzing business and user needs in consultation with both business managers and... end users
• Works on multiple tasks/projects as team member.
• Works with internal and external customers and IT partners to develop and analyze business intelligence needs and determines optimum BI solutions to meet needs.
• Makes recommendations on BI tools selection to meet needs
• Creates, maintains, or enhances visualization dashboards residing in different platforms, e.g., PowerBI, Tableau, Macro/VBA.
• Collaborates with database analysts, data architects and data scientists to deliver analytics solutions
• Conduct training and knowledge share with support team members, deliver demos to business, and train the site users on analytics tools
• Works closely with business users guiding them to create and maintain datasets for self-service analytics in any BI tools
• Troubleshoots performance issues in reports and dashboards and provide guidelines and solutions on performance tuning

Innovation/Other Duties
• Drives continuous improvement through learning new technologies/best practices that will have an impact on the enterprise-wide BI systems.
• Communicates analysis results and makes recommendations to senior management
• Participates in the exchange of ideas and information within the department
• Ensures adherence to best practices throughout the Jabil organization
• Champions and influences the development of the Jabil data analytics culture and community

Education & Experience Requirements
• Degree in Computer Science, MIS, Supply Chain, Analytics, Data Science, or computer related discipline preferred.
• Minimum of 5 or more years working experience, preferably in data analytics related area
• Advanced skills in developing Business intelligence dashboards and reports
• Have a s solid understanding of the benefit and key elements in the field of data analytics
• Good communicator and able to tell the story with data
• Experience with UI/UX and visual design considerations for reporting

BE AWARE OF FRAUD: When applying for a job at Jabil you will be contacted via correspondence through our official job portal with a jabil.com e-mail address; direct phone call from a member of the Jabil team; or direct e-mail with a jabil.com e-mail address. Jabil does not request payments for interviews or at any other point during the hiring process. Jabil will not ask for your personal identifying information such as a social security number, birth certificate, financial institution, driver’s license number or passport information over the phone or via e-mail. If you believe you are a victim of identity theft, contact your local police department. Any scam job listings should be reported to whatever website it was posted in.

Jabil, including its subsidiaries, is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identify, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law

title: Data Management SQL, Business Analyst, Python
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us

Attractive package
Flexible Working Arrangement
The Job

Lazada Customer Care team is transforming from backend support to a trusted advisor team with the Voice of Customer & Data (VoC & Data) team as one of the Core functions to provide data analysis & insight to understand/ predict customer needs and priorities. This role will focus on helping the team to access the right data and provide consultancy based on data findings.

Report to the Head of VoC & Data, your responsibility:
• Work with local CC teams (including BPO performance, Buyer& Seller Support, Buyer& Seller Experience, and VoC) to identify the business needs and provide relevant support with dashboard/report/ analysis/ insights by:
• Identifying, analyzing, and interpreting trends or patterns in complex data sets.
• Consulting and proposing improvements to all CC teams using data insight.
• Working with management to prioritize business and information needs.
• Locating and identifying new... process improvement opportunities.
• Monitoring data trends and escalating to respective stakeholders.
• Work with the Regional CC team to ensure data are corrected and aligned.
• Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
• Coach and develop junior members within the Data team.

Your Skills and Experience

Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree (or above) majoring in statistics, mathematics, computing, business analytics, or related fields.
• At least 5 years of proven working experience as a data analyst or business data analyst. Experience in managing a team is a plus.
• Technical expertise in data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques.
• Strong knowledge of and experience with databases (Pythons, SQL, etc.), and programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks).
• Excellent presentation skills and strong knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (MS Excel). Able to translate complex ideas and data into simpler and understandable communication.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy. Critical Thinking, adept at queries, report writing, and presenting findings.
• An ability to think ahead and plan over a 3-9-month time span.
• Strong customer orientation, attention to detail and can work under tight deadlines.
• Familiar with Power BI/ Aspect/ SnapEngage/ Salesforce Platform.

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Attractive package, receive a full salary in the probation period
• Flexible Working Arrangement
• Laptop/ Macbook provided
• Premium medical insurance for you and your family (Critical Illness Insurance included)
• Comfortable working hours in the office, no dress code
• Strong ownership, teamwork and dynamic culture
• Plenty of career growth opportunities, and a personal development system for both specialists and managers

description: - Xây dựng các dashboard báo cáo tiêu chuẩn sử dụng Tableau để thường xuyên cập nhật cho quản lý và các bộ phận khác về diễn biến của các dữ liệu phục vụ cho việc theo dõi hiệu quả, tối ưu các hoạt động truyền thông và dự báo xu hướng. - Thực hiện các báo cáo chuyên sâu theo yêu cầu và đơn đặt hàng của các bộ phận khác để trả lời cho các câu hỏi như hiệu quả chiến dịch, dữ liệu thấu hiểu khách hàng (insights), xu hướng của thị trường,… hỗ trợ việc đề xuất các chiến lược truyền thông cho Khách hàng. - Tập trung và kết nối các dữ liệu của bộ phận Truyền thông. Đặc biệt xây dựng một bộ cấu trúc dữ liệu hoàn chỉnh từ nhiều nguồn dữ liệu rải rác khắp nơi và chưa có cấu trúc. - Tổng hợp và xuất nhập các dữ liệu từ dạng thô thành các dữ liệu sạch, được chuẩn hoá phục vụ cho phân tích. - Trong tương lai gần, tham gia triển khai các dự án dữ liệu – Data warehouse, CDP. Chủ động đi tìm các bài toán về dữ liệu và thực hiện các mô hình phân tích dữ liệu phức tạp hơn, trả lời các câu hỏi của công... ty như + Hỗ trợ các kế hoạch phát triển sản phẩm mới + Hỗ trợ phân tích thông điệp, kênh truyền thông thu hút khách hàng mới, dự đoán hiệu quả đầu tư truyền thông khi thêm ngân sách, … + Doanh thu trực tuyến, đánh giá được các nội dung/kênh truyền thông tạo ra được nhiều Khách hàng tiềm năng nhất, dự đoán chuyển đổi đơn hàng theo sản phẩm, theo thời gian hay theo kênh bán hàng trực tuyến… Yêu cầu kỹ năng * Yêu cầu công việc - Có kinh nghiệm từ 1 năm trở lên sử dụng thành thạo công cụ Taleau trong phân tích dữ liệu. - Có khả năng trích xuất các giá trị từ dữ liệu để chuyển hoá thành các biểu đồ, báo cáo. - Tốt nghiệp Đại học các trường chuyên ngành tin học kinh tế, kiểm toán, công nghệ thông tin, hoặc kế toán tài chính - Có bằng cấp hoặc hoặc sẵn sàng học Python (Jupyter notebook). Biết về Rstudio hoặc từng sử dụng Power BI là một lợi thế. - Có kinh nghiệm về các phương pháp phân tích dữ liệu truyền thông và marketing như các mô hình RFM, marketing attribution model,.. là một lợi thế lớn. - Hiểu biết về các phương pháp thu thập, thông số dữ liệu marketing như dữ liệu người dùng thu thập được (owned channels: Google analytics, Facebook insights, Firebase), dữ liệu digital media ads (paid channels), dữ liệu lắng nghe mạng xã hội, dữ liệu khách hàng … - Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt và có khả năng thuyết trình, trình bày. - Có kiến thức cơ bản về các CSDL như sql, MongoDB, … và có khả năng thực hiện các querry căn bản để truy xuất dữ liệu. - Chủ động trong công việc, teamwork và làm việc dưới áp lực

title: Growth Data Analyst (APAC Remote/HCMC, relocation support available)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About Sky Mavis

Sky Mavis, the pioneer behind the blockchain game Axie Infinity, is revolutionizing the virtual gaming world with innovative technology and infrastructure. We are committed to fostering a dynamic and inclusive work culture where individuals can bring their authentic selves to the table. As a team of entrepreneurial disruptors and gamers, we are driven by a shared passion for making a meaningful impact and embracing the challenges and critiques that come with being at the forefront of technological advancement.

The Sky Mavis growth team is seeking a highly skilled Growth Data Analyst to join us and play a key role in driving our growth engine. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of data and strong skills in structuring, cleaning, transforming, analyzing and visualizing data to extract actionable insights. The candidate will work closely with the growth team, data team, as well as cross-functional teams such as product, and engineering, to improve our... gamer acquisition, retention, and monetization strategies. The candidate's expertise in data and statistical experimentation will inform and guide our overall growth strategy. Additionally, we are looking for someone who is passionate about games and emerging technologies like blockchain and motivated to shape the future of the industry.

Duties & Responsibilities:
• Drive data-driven methodologies to analyze the health of our products and optimize (inclusive of experimentation) based on user segments, lifecycle stages and other critical user attributes
• Create data visualizations to communicate insights to stakeholders using tools such as Redash, Amplitude and Looker
• Track, collect, clean, and analyze large amounts of data to surface insights with actionable recommendations
• Contribute to developing (alongside growth & product counterparts) product experimentation plans (e.g. A/B tests) to improve key KPIs and conduct post-mortem
• Collaborate with key stakeholders to design, implement, and analyze A/B testing for our products, with the goal of improving user acquisition, retention, and monetization
• Continuously monitor industry trends and best practices to stay ahead of the curve

Requirements
• 5+ years of experience working in data analyst or data science functions with an understanding of statistical concepts
• Proven track record of driving business impact through analysis/insights for a mobile app or a cross-platform service
• Strong analytical & problem-solving skills. Able to develop and use structured approaches to identify root causes and make recommendations
• Proficient in A/B testing, SQL, Excel/Spreadsheet and working knowledge in Python
• Working knowledge in Looker and Amplitude is a plus
• Strong cross-functional skills and ability to operate independently under ambiguous and fast-moving environments
• Experience communicating effectively across the company with thoughtfulness around optimizing communication across time zones and different preferred styles
• Passion for Web3/blockchain gaming and a desire to work in a fast-paced startup environment

Benefits

A competitive salary package that fits your skills, experiences, and contributions

Freedom, autonomy & ownership around your work

Contribute to making revolutionary games

Acquire new and unique skills as we usher in a new era of digital ownership

Give yourself and your family the security you deserve

description:
Mô tả công việc

- Tham gia thu thập dữ liệu dựa trên nhu cầu nghiên cứu của khách hàng và tham gia xây dựng hướng tiếp cận dữ liệu phù hợp (ví dụ số lượng mẫu, phương pháp chọn mẫu, xử lý dữ liệu đầu vào, các loại dữ liệu cần thu thập, …) để bổ sung đủ dữ liệu cho nghiên cứu bằng Social Listening Tools.

- Tham gia theo dõi, phát hiện và báo cáo thông tin tiêu cực về công ty/thương hiệu/ sản phẩm/chương trình thông qua Social Listening Tools.

- Tham gia thu thập dữ liệu dựa trên nhu cầu nghiên cứu của khách hàng và tham gia xây dựng hướng tiếp cận dữ liệu phù hợp (ví dụ số lượng mẫu, phương pháp chọn mẫu, quy trình xử lý dữ liệu, các loại dữ liệu cần thu thập, …) để bổ sung đủ dữ liệu cho nghiên cứu.

- Làm quen với việc xây dựng khung báo cáo theo đúng nhu cầu của khách hàng.

- Tham gia theo dõi, phát hiện và báo cáo thông tin tiêu cực về công ty/thương hiệu/ sản phẩm/chương trình.

Yêu cầu ứng viên

Sinh viên năm 2, năm 3, ưu tiên các bạn yêu thích ngành Marketing, Digital Marketing, Market Research.

- Yêu thích công việc trên máy tính, làm việc với con số và chữ, có khả năng tìm kiếm trên google, am hiểu internet, các mạng xã hội.

Trong CV yêu cầu ghi rõ về kinh nghiệm làm việc và quá trình học tập của bản thân.

Quyền lợi được hưởng

title: Data Analyst
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
We love pizza. We eat it a lot. There’s no doubt about that and we’re proud of it. But what makes us different is that it’s our people that drive the success of our business.

Alongside KFC, Taco Bell and The Habit Burger Grill, we are part of the Yum! family; the world’s largest restaurant company with nearly 54,000 restaurants in over 140 countries. At Pizza Hut, we are on a journey to build the most loved global brand and the fastest growing in every country; we have big plans over the next 5 years to achieve explosive growth in a competitive and ever-growing market.

We want to make it easy to get the best pizza and digital is at the core for this. We have recently created a startup: Pizza Hut Digital Ventures, committed to building innovative digital solutions, providing our customers with an exceptional experience. From building a world-class platform and clean mobile experiences we are pushing the boundaries to ensure we are a source of innovation.

JOB DESCRIPTION

HutBot is a... fast-growing team in Pizza Hut Digital Ventures. The team is responsible for optimizing back of house operations in Pizza Hut restaurants across 70+ countries in the world through super-app mobile applications. HutBot utilizes a vast Operational Data to surface opportunities for our Team to focus on improving the Customer Experience, execution of standards and to increase sales.

We’re looking for a Data Analyst with a proven track record working in digital businesses, who is passionate about leveraging data to solve business problems and make data driven strategic decisions.

Reporting to the Data Analytics Lead, Product Owner and working closely with the design and engineering teams, your goal will be to support driving our strategy through providing valuable insight, analysis of our Operational Data and recommendations to help the growth of our app business.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Data Analytics & Insights
• Anticipate the upcoming trends and business demands to propose impactful analysis
• Provide timely and accurate App specific data to the business stakeholder, engineering and design team and the wider leadership team
• Build, update and maintain analytics reports and dashboards and present this data to wider teams when requested

Management
• Supervise the data quality and information system to ensure adequacy, accuracy, and legitimacy of data products (including but not limited to reports, insights, analytics tools, models)
• Facilitate & communicate data vision and strategies across functions & business units
• Develop the analytics capacities in team: coaching junior data analysts on analytics methods and techniques, enhancing knowledge about our customers, products, and business

Innovation (AI/ML)
• Participate in driving data-empowered innovations through Machine Learning (ML), Artificial Intelligence (AI) to improve the efficiency & quality of Pizza Hut business
• Collaborate with stakeholders to provide Data, ML/AI learnings, and strategic input to business visions and projects
• Collaborate with stakeholders to design the framework of AI/ML building, testing, deployment
• Supervise & ensure the quality, and efficiency of ML/AI deliverables

REQUIREMENTS

Technical requirements
• At least 2 years proven experience in Data Analyst or relevant positions.
• Strong experience with programming language such as SQL, R, Python, etc to develop and maintain ETL flow.
• Strong understanding of data analytics cycle – collecting, preprocessing, modelling, analyzing, presenting results/insights.
• Fluence with designing analytics dashboards using Business Intelligence tools – PowerBI, Domo, Tableau, Qlik
• Experience with cloud data analytics services, knowledge of statistical analytics approach (descriptive analysis, hypothesis testing, etc.) is an advantage

Business requirements
• Fluence English skills - written and verbal communication.
• Experience in working with senior stakeholders and communicating complex, technical information in an engaging way to both technical and non-technical audiences
• Analytical, problem-solving skills
• High Adaptability (quick-learner & able to adapt quickly with changes in high uncertainty environment)
• Experience with operation, compliance analysis is an advantage

WHY YOU LOVE WORKING HERE
• Annual Leave: 18 days/ year
• Probation Leave: 3 days/ 2 month
• 100% salary during probation period
• Salary review: 2 times/year
• 13th-month bonus
• Gift for birthday
• Company Trip once a year
• Full salary insurance
• Premium Health Insurance
• International working environment
• Hybrid working environment with flexible working hours
• Company Laptop and Monitor

title: Data Scientist
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us

The Job

Gene Solutions là công ty hàng đầu tại Việt Nam chuyên nghiên cứu, phát triển và ứng dụng các xét nghiệm gen tiên tiến nhất, cung cấp các dịch vụ xét nghiệm liên quan đến di truyền phục vụ sàng lọc, chẩn đoán bệnh và định hướng điều trị liên quan đến gen.

Trong những năm qua, Gene Solutions có những bước phát triển và không ngừng đầu tư xây dựng đội ngũ R&D mạnh và xuất sắc, tập trung nghiên cứu và ứng dụng những công nghệ hữu ích đã được chứng nhận trên thế giới nhằm mang đến các xét nghiệm gen mới nhất với chất lượng tốt nhất và chi phí hợp lý nhất, tăng khả năng tiếp cận của người Việt Nam tới những xét nghiệm di truyền thiết yếu phục vụ cho việc phòng, khám và chữa bệnh, nâng tầm chất lượng khám chữa bệnh, đóng góp vào công cuộc nâng cao chất lượng dịch vụ y tế và sức khỏe cho cộng đồng.

MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
• Phân tích các dữ liệu sinh học, chủ yếu là trình tự next-generation sequencing.
• Xây dựng quy trình phân tích dữ liệu giải trình tự... (next-generation sequencing pipelines).
• Phát triển các mô hình máy học để phân loại hoặc tiên lượng.
• Tham gia vào dự án phân tích dữ liệu cỡ lớn để khai khoáng dữ liệu, xây dựng mô hình và phát triển thuật toán.
• Phát triển quy trình phân tích dữ liệu tự động mới.
• Tham gia xử lý lỗi và cải tiến quy trình phân tích dữ liệu.

Your Skills and Experience

Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm một người:
• Có bằng Thạc sĩ các chuyên ngành liên quan, hoặc bằng Đại học với tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm
• Có kinh nghiệm về machine learning và deep learning, kinh nghiệm làm việc với big data.
• Hiểu biết về xác suất thống kê và máy học, điểm cộng nếu có kiến thức về cách xử lý dữ liệu trình tự DNA
• Sẵn sàng học tập và áp dụng các phương pháp, giải thuật mới nhất.
• Khả năng làm việc theo nhóm cũng như làm việc độc lập tốt.
• Mong muốn xây dựng các giá trị tích cực vì cộng đồng

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Lương tháng 13
• Bảo hiểm y tế tư nhân
• Vouchers, quà vào các dịp đặc biệt
• Nghỉ Lễ Tết, phép năm đầy đủ theo đúng quy định của Nhà nước.
• Tham gia tất cả các bảo hiểm (BHXH, BHYT, BHTN), được hưởng đầy đủ chính sách, chế độ theo Luật lao động.
• Mô trường làm việc năng động, nhân văn.
• Du lịch thường niên

title: Senior People Data Analyst (Bangkok Based, relocation provided)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
About Agoda

Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 6,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.

Get To Know Our Team

The People Team is a purveyor of opportunity, searching the globe for the most talented individuals and offering them an open, collaborative workplace. By prioritizing skill and potential, we have cultivated a powerful assembly of professionals through our drive for equal opportunity and diversity. We make the move to Agoda a breeze with assisted onboarding programs, and we continue to support and enrich our thousands of Agoda employees through individual... growth with outstanding learning programs and various means of assistance. Our development of incredible benefits has ensured everyone can stay strong, healthy, and happy during their time at Agoda. Leading ambitious changes and making a positive impact in the lives of our employees, the People Team is a crucial and rewarding part of the Agoda family.

The Opportunity

The Senior People Data Analyst will contribute to the People Planning & Analytics organizations’ success by providing pro-active analysis around People data, working with People Team and other Business stakeholders to identify patterns and provide actionable recommendations. As part of the organization, you’ll be working actively on budgeting activities and process and progressive improvement of the tools and processes of the team. This role collaborates closely with Finance and People team stakeholders to ensure activities are aligned with Agoda’s strategic goals and Personnel budget. The rapid growth of the business and the increasing complexity driven by new launches and services make this an exciting, and challenging proposition.

In this Role you’ll get,
• Add immediate value to the organization by delivering insightful analysis, dashboards and presentations to business & leadership about People data (recruitment, attrition, performance) to support long-term strategic decision making
• Get involved in the operational Budgeting and Workforce planning of the company
• Provide financial analysis & commentary on month-end financials & KPIs/OKRs
• Be a trusted advisor to Business Partners across the organization
• Enhance the understanding and key levers of the Agoda business

What You’ll Need To Succeed
• Bachelor’s degree required
• 3-5 years of experience as Data analyst, preferably in an HR environment
• 2-3 years of practical experience with MSSQL (or equivalent database), Tableau visualization
• High level of discretion, confidentiality and ethics
• Ability to work well with employees in a highly multi-cultural environment
• Strong attention to detail and accuracy
• Self-starter with ability to work independently, while also collaborating with cross-functional teams
• Ownership mindset and ability to meet tight deadlines with a logical, methodical approach to prioritizing tasks and responsibilities

Great if you have
• Experience with OneStream software
• Workforce planning and Budgeting experience
• Commercial awareness, ability to think both analytically and strategically, to identify about underlying business issues
• Willingness to challenge the status quo and propose improvements in existing processes
• Curiosity and willingness to get involved in the business to understand the story behind the numbers

title: Head Of Data
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
Top 100 Nơi làm việc tốt nhất tại Việt Nam
Sản phẩm tạo giá trị bền vững cho cộng đồng.
Thu nhập cạnh tranh & nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến
The Job

Report to: CIO

The Head of Data establishes the organisation's data strategy and framework, fostering a culture of compliance to data privacy regulations. S/He is accountable for the quality, accessibility, analysis and management of data to inform business strategy, decision-making and drive performance. S/He designs initiatives and programs to realise the optimal business value derivable from the organisation's data assets. S/He formulates data project prioritisation and resourcing strategies and establishes performance measures to evaluate outcomes data solutions. S/He identifies potential intellectual property (IP) opportunities from analyses and insights from market intelligence reports, and advises the business on infringements against the organisation's IP related solutions. S/He creates a shared vision and... objectives on the use of data in the organisation, building strategic relationships with key business and industry stakeholders to achieve business goals.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

1. Establish data strategy:
• Establish the organisation's data and AI strategy, data privacy policies, and the Ethics and Governance framework.
• Align data and AI strategy, priorities and plans of the data function to the organisation's vision and mission
• Formulate approaches to maximise the value of data analytics capabilities and technological investments for the organisation
• Develop strategies to ensure seamless integration of technologies with workflows and processes across the organisation
• Promote the adoption of industry leading practices and new data management technologies across the organisation

2. Optimize business value from data:
• Design data and AI driven initiatives to leverage the value of data assets in the organisation
• Lead the identification of high business value business opportunities through application of data and AI solutions
• Advise the team on new and innovative tools and techniques to derive greater value from data
• Determine and showcase the potential value and impact of analytics and intelligent systems on existing business processes

3. Formulate objectives and requirements from a business perspective
• Formulate project prioritisation and resourcing strategies for AI and Data Science projects across the organisation
• Establish performance measures to evaluate data and AI initiatives, programmes, and value derived from effective data management
• Advise the team on new and innovative tools and techniques to derive greater value from data

4. Manage intellectual property (IP) strategies, processes and procedures
• Review emerging trends and intelligence, and analyse technology landscape reports and analyses to identify potential IP opportunities
• Oversee systems and processes to manage IP related to AI solutions and/or models
• Act as a subject matter expert and resource person for infringements against the organisation's IP related to AI solutions and/or models

5. Build strategic relationships
• Develop a stakeholder management plan to create shared vision and objectives on the use of data and AI in the organisation
• Lead engagement initiatives with key leaders and senior stakeholders to obtain buy-in for data and AI initiatives
• Source for data analytics opportunities for the business and ensure data and indo compliance with business policies and external legal requirements

6. Develop organisation's data capabilities
• Develop strategies and plans to build capabilities within the Data and Artificial Intelligence function
• Drive talent management initiatives to attract, motivate and retain talent for Data Science and AI teams
• Ensure AI solutions and deployment is guided by organisation’s corporate values
• Lead succession planning and management for key leadership roles in the Data and Artificial Intelligence function

7. Establish BI standards and governance
• Develop standards, policies and procedures for the form, structure and attributes of the BI tools and systems
• Create long-term data governance initiatives that serve to improve data quality across all systems over time
• Provide guidance on best practices related to BI data governance

8. Manage operations and BI resources
• Review operational strategies, policies and targets across teams and projects
• Develop strategies for resource planning and utilization
• Establish performance indicators to benchmark effectiveness of learning and development programs against best practices
• Implement succession planning initiatives for key management positions

9. Manage people and organization
• Review operational strategies, policies and targets across teams and projects
• Develop strategies for resource planning and utilization
• Review the utilization of resources
• Oversee the development of learning roadmaps for teams and functions
• Establish performance indicators to benchmark effectiveness of learning and development programmes against best practices
• Implement succession planning initiatives for key management positions

Your Skills and Experience
• Bachelor Degree with relevant background
• 10 years of experience in a similar position
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills, along with presentation skills.

Why You'll Love Working Here

CÔNG BẰNG & TRÁCH NHIỆM

Tại GreenFeed Việt Nam, chúng tôi luôn tôn trọng sự thẳng thắn, rõ ràng, minh bạch, không né tránh trước các sai lầm và yếu kém. Do đó, các cấp quản lý luôn nâng đỡ, có trách nhiệm giao việc rõ ràng tạo nền tảng để nhân viên thành công. Đặt niềm tin, đối xử dựa trên năng lực hành việc làm việc và kết quả một cách công bằng nhất.

GreenFeed Việt Nam luôn tìm kiếm những cá nhân độc lập và khác biệt đảm bảo các yêu cầu cơ bản: trung thực, tự tin, nhiệt huyết, thực thi, kiên quyết, cầu tiến, đồng lòng, đồng đội và can đảm. Ngoài ra, các cấp lãnh đạo và quản lý luôn tôn trọng và tạo sự tin tưởng, nâng đỡ nhân viên phát triển và thành công với tâm thế thẳng thắn, trách nhiệm và công bằng. Tạo môi trường lành mạnh, rõ ràng và minh bạch. Đây là các giá trị cốt lõi mà công ty đã và đang hướng đến.

MÔI TRƯỜNG LÀM VIỆC

Không gian làm việc GreenFeed Việt Nam là một không gian mở, thúc đẩy sự sáng tạo. Đồng thời, tất cả các thành viên đều được khuyến khích đóng góp ý kiến, chia sẻ và tranh luận một cách thẳng thắn để thắt chặt tình đồng đội và rèn luyện bản lĩnh của mỗi người.

ĐÃI NGỘ - PHÚC LỢI
• Lương & phúc lợi cạnh tranh
• Lương tháng 13
• Thưởng hiệu quả cuối năm
• Thưởng thâm niên
• Gói bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe nội & ngoại trú cho nhân viên và người thân
• Chế độ đào tạo, cơ hội thăng tiến
• Thiết bị làm việc
• Teambuilding
• Quà tặng sinh nhật, lễ, tết, trung thu
• Đồng phục

title: DATA ANALYST SPECIALIST
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Job Description
• Support and implement high-quality, data-driven decisions making culture (60%)
• Manage and optimize processes for data acquisition, validation, mining and engineering as well as modeling, visualization and communication deliverables.
• Build, develop and maintain (or coordinate with BI team to do) CATEGORY data models, reporting systems, data automation systems, dashboards and performance metrics support that support key business decisions
• Oversee the design and delivery of reports and insights that analyze customer experience and performance metrics
• Ensure accuracy of data and deliverables with comprehensive policies and processes
• Implement data mining & analysis by applying advanced data modeling, predictive modeling and analytical techniques (40%)
• Using advanced data modeling and analysis techniques to discover insights that will guide strategic decisions and uncover optimization opportunities
• Examine, interpret and report results of analytical... initiatives to stakeholders in leadership, technology, sales, marketing and product teams.

REQUEST
• SKILLS:
• Understanding of and experience using analytical concepts and statistical techniques: Hypothesis Testing, designing tests/experiments, analyzing data, drawing conclusions, and developing actionable recommendations for business.
• Experience writing Excel macros, working with and creating databases and dashboards using all relevant data to inform decisions.
• Working knowledge of data mining principles: mapping, collecting data from multiple data systems on premises and cloud-based data sources
• SQL basic
• Strong problem solving, quantitative and analytical abilities
• Strong ability to plan and manage numerous processes, people and projects simultaneously.
• EXPERIENCE:
• 2 - 3 years of experience with Data Analyst/ Business Intelligence/ Business Analyst
• ATTITUDES:
• Strong work ethic: who understand and possess a willingness to work hard & work smart
• Result-oriented: Plan towards specific targets; organize teams with target and time in mind; prioritize problem-solving rather than problem-identification or waiting for someone else to solve the matter; manage people in a way to maximize productivity including firing or reassigning resources that may distract team or company from achieving desired results - sort of a ‘no-hard feelings, it’s business’ approach
• Speed, flexibility and agility

title: Senior Data Engineer
location: Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us
International working environment
Highly scalable platforms with 2+ billion visits
Great colleagues
The Job

Global Fashion Group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across LATAM, SEA and ANZ. Our three e-commerce platforms: THE ICONIC, ZALORA and Dafiti connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to millions of consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. Powered by our best-in-class operational infrastructure, which is fashion-specific and tailored to local market needs, our platforms provide an inspiring and seamless end-to-end customer experience. We stand for benchmark-setting customer service, delivery options, returns policies, and curation of brands.

About the function

At GFG, Technology is driven by innovation and quality is highly valued. Our data team is the driving force behind our business strategies and decisions. We are integrated into all departments to ensure all employees at THE ICONIC have... access to good quality and timely data.

Our Data Engineering team solves complex problems and delivers data to propel our business forward, powering the insights that are used in every decision we make. We are the engineers, the builders, the maintenance people for all our business data.

Key tech you’ll play with in this role
• Both AWS and GCP
• BigQuery, SQL Server and Redshift
• Docker & Kubernetes
• Airflow, Cloud Composer and Pentaho
• Cloud Dataflow/Apache Beam
• High velocity streaming data, behavioural data and well as structured and unstructured data

What you will do
• Develop and support our enterprise data warehouses, analytical databases and infrastructure
• Work with the team to re-platform our existing data architecture to next generation tooling and data architecture
• Build/Maintain our data pipelines in Python and SQL to ensure that data is delivered in a timely manner
• Work closely with our Data Scientists and Data Analysts to implement new insights and statistical models
• Assist in developing tools/processes to enable our business to self serve

Your Skills and Experience

What we are looking for
• Extensive programming knowledge of Data processing within Python
• DataFrames
• Pandas
• Dependency management within Python
• Iterators, producers and consumer knowledge
• Airflow DAG building
• CI/CD - Bamboo Deployment / Delivery Experience
• Strong SQL coding skills
• Advanced Data Engineering Design Skills
• Excellent communication skills
• Significant experience in a similar Data Engineering role
• Strong data warehousing/Data Engineering experience
• Experience with data modelling and complex ETL solutions
• Test and QA Experience in Data Pipelines

Ways to stand out from the crowd
• GCP experience
• BigQuery/Redshift
• Cube/SSAS Experience
• DevOps/CICD
• Docker
• Airflow
• R

Why You'll Love Working Here
• Annual Leave: 15 days
• Sick leave/Mental Health Days: 30 days.
• Occasion leave: 1 day.
• 13th month salary.
• Annual bonus: up to 3 months based salary (depends on company performance).
• Home Workspace support: up to 10mil/person.
• Learning budget up to EUR 500/person.
• Free Linkedin Learning, Udemy account.
• Medical benefits: Social insurance, medical insurance & AON insurance.
• Macbook is provided.
• Support for English class.
• Support Gym membership.
• Additionally, we offer a flat hierarchy, a fun and flexible work environment

title: Senior Data Analyst (Based in HCM)
location: Hồ Chí Minh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
description:
Objective
• As an Amanotes’ product Data Analyst, you have the chance to deal with data of 2+ billion users to generate accurate, actionable, and timely insights for the products team, in order to boost user understanding and product optimization

What You Will Do
• Answer business questions, such as pattern recognition of user behavior, and product optimization…, by extracting, manipulating, and analyzing data while applying statistical techniques
• Work closely with the Product team in planning and daily operation to identify opportunities for other data solutions, provide insight and consult on action for product optimization
• Construct dashboards to monitor business performance, create and maintain data documentation
• Build, optimize and ensure the quality of data / ETL pipeline with the Central Data team

Qualifications
• Be fluent in SQL for data pipeline building, ad-hoc requests, and debugging
• Be able to use standard statistical & analytical techniques: A/B testing ... Hypothesis testing, cohort analysis, correlation,...
• Be able to communicate data findings with appropriate examples from data points of view, using proper visualization (bar, line, histogram, bubble chart...)
• Be able to give clear and actionable recommendations based on data findings
• Have a good command of critical/logical/analytical thinking & problem-solving skills
• Be fast, proactive, and have good learning agility
• Experience with the following is appreciated: Maths and Statistics (especially Statistical Inference), SQL, Python, and Data visualization tools

Nice to have:
• Basic understanding of mobile app/mobile-game industry and good command of English
• Having basic knowledge of machine learning is a plus

About Amanotes

We are Amanotes - a fast-growing music-tech company. We seek to delight people with interactive music experiences. Since 2014, 50+ music games and mobile applications were published under our name with 2.5+ billion downloads worldwide and 120+ million monthly active users. From 2019, we were proudly listed as the #1 mobile apps publisher from Southeast Asia, the #1 music games publisher worldwide, and one of the top 10 mobile app publishers across all categories. In 2022, we’ve got certification as a “Great Place to Work’’, and Vietnam's best IT companies 2022 award by ITviec.

If you love to work in a creative environment with music all around the corner, come join us!

Explore our products on Google Play and iOS App Store such as Magic Tiles 3, Tiles Hop and Dancing Road.

How To Apply?

Click the button or contact us at talents@amanotes.com

The Job
• Contribute to the team’s success by using Python 3.7, FastAPI and Domain-Driven Design, micro-services to spin up new services and APIs (writing and consumption).
• Collaborate with product, design and other teams to gain sufficient business understanding to serve the needs of customers and colleagues and to support your team members in delivering solutions.

• Model good leadership behaviour by engaging in peer to peer feedback and code reviews to foster a healthy, collaborative engineering culture as measured by Scrum team health checks.
• Use unit test and agile practices to deliver features continuously to production, measured by feedback and daily releases going smoothly.
• Embrace a fast... paced environment and have a keen interest in data / Machine learning tech.

Your Skills and Experience
• You have 4+ years of experience in backend development using Python and have worked confidently within teams delivering data driven systems.
• You have knowledge of scaling practices such as in-memory databases, load balancing, caching, etc.
• You’re comfortable with both NoSQL and SQL databases.
• You have 3+ years experience in deploying systems on GCP or AWS and knowledge of containerization (e.g. Docker)
• You can give and take in discussions and make tactical decisions to reduce risk when delivering functionality, which is the primary measure of progress.
• You’re a team player who is solutions oriented.
• Experience in leading a team or mentoring younger developers will be highly regarded
• You have deep exposure to ETL and ELT.
• Having wide exposure to multiple technology stacks is an advantage, we love full-stack engineers.
• You’re proficient in code review, code refactoring, Unit Testing.
• Backend security knowledge is a plus
• Good communication in English is a plus.

Why You'll Love Working Here
